It is actually TOO sensitive and is activated if a customer is anywhere near the door (ex. a customer stands near the door while saying "good-bye" or whatever). We remedied this by putting tape over part of the sensor. I do wish there was a way to adjust the "bell"- three rings is more than we need and it can get quite annoying if several people go through the door in a short period of time.

Reviews.Title: Driveway monitor
Reviews.Author: Robert P. Egler
Reviews.Content: Works great. Been using if for several years now.  I was very surprised how long a set of batteries last in the outdoor sensor.

Reviews.Title: not very good
Reviews.Author: Mark L. Karas
Reviews.Content: lasted three months and started going off on its own all the time..junk..better off buying one local so you can return it easier

Reviews.Title: Long distance, accurate sensing.
Reviews.Author: Gheldmandare Inc.
Reviews.Content: The price is good and the unit works as advertised. I put the sensor unit on my front door and the receiver in back office. The distance is around 100 feet and there are 3 rooms in between. And, it works pretty good.First installation caused some false sensing. After adjust the angle of the sensor, it detects man movement very accurate.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Joyce A. Griffin
Reviews.Content: The sensors seem to have a 30 ft. range.  I ordered four but found that only one monitor is needed as they are all on the same frequency.  I got some alarms from shrubbery moving in the wind and will have to remove those plants.  It alerts me to movement and that's what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Many uses for these
Reviews.Author: Chet
Reviews.Content: Have used these for many things. I've had three of them, even used them to catch armadillos tearing up the yard. They're great just to know when something's moving around the property. I have also used them to scare deer out of the yard. Just set the alarm by the sensor.

Reviews.Title: Better than nothing, but not a perfect solution
Reviews.Author: Julie Kilpatrick "JKILPAT"
Reviews.Content: This seemed like the perfect solution for our side driveway.  We read all the reviews and followed the recommendations to put the sensor in a birdhouse to shade it from the sun.  That seems to work for the most part, but it's far from perfect.  We only turn on the sensor when we are expecting someone.  We still get an occasional false alarm, and the sensor seems to have some difficulty detecting "red" cars in particular - not sure why.  Also, since the sensor in the birdhouse is always on, the batteries need to be changed more frequently than we would like.  It's better than nothing, but far from the perfect solution we hoped for.

Reviews.Title: It does EXACTLY what it is supposed to do, and inexpensively
Reviews.Author: James T. Rook "Turtleman"
Reviews.Content: It does EXACTLY what it is supposed to do, and inexpensively.  I have MANY of these ... all bought separately as I needed more coverage.

Reviews.Title: too sensitive. not enough distance.
Reviews.Author: M. Lamoglia "Nostalgic Lamoglia"
Reviews.Content: trash. goes off every hour on the hour as the sun travels the sky. any type of shadow makes it go off. I keep jumping out of my chair thinking someone is making off with my backyard ho, and I don't mean my girl. HA! Also the distance from the transmitter to the base is nowhere near what they say. I would say about 40ft max!

Reviews.Title: Loud but not "alarm" sounding
Reviews.Author: DivaMommy
Reviews.Content: We now have three of these although I've never put them too far apart from their base unit.  The dong is like an annoyingly loud doorbell but it made us feel better having the first one in the garage so burglars might wig out at setting off an 'alarm'.  I deducted one star as it seems to go through batteries faster than I would expect; its not really working hard all the time looking, right?  Be prepared to check batteries a lot but its a nice warning system for burglary prevention or driveway notification.

Reviews.Title: Works great for a month!
Reviews.Author: SrCash
Reviews.Content: Stopped working after 30 days. Not worth the postage to fix there and back. Also goes though batteries like crazy, two sets in three weeks!

Reviews.Title: Works okay
Reviews.Author: jamie gregory
Reviews.Content: Having a hard time finding a good position for this, bushes set off alarm when wind blows, and I need still more range from receiver

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product!!
Reviews.Author: DebBee
Reviews.Content: I've had SIX solar lights and a Birdhouse stolen, from my front yard at night,  in the past year. I decided to buy one of these, in addition to a couple Mr.Beam battery-operated motion sensor lights, for some low-cost home security. Hopefully, it will discourage the piece of trash thief/neighbor, who can't seem to control theirself, when passing by. For around $20 (including the batteries) I now feel very safe knowing if anyone is lurking around out front, or coming to my front door, my dogs and I will be alerted. And probably the best part is, since these types of units are battery-operated, I will be safe even in a power outage. All I did was open the box, inserted the batteries, secured the sensor unit to my rain gutter, by wrapping some thin wire around the unit top and bottom and I was done.

Reviews.Title: poor quality product
Reviews.Author: Kitty F Powers
Reviews.Content: Installation was easy.  It receives only 2 stars because it has frequent false alarms and does not cosistantly alarm when it should.  It misses about 40% of the time.  I would not recommend this item.  Sorry.

Reviews.Title: for the price it works fine !
Reviews.Author: Natacha
Reviews.Content: i bought those to replace my old one (exactly the same) for the price  they last 3-4 years, and yes you need to place them were the trees branches will not be in the way. the 2 sensor could be use with only on alarm box. very practical for a long driveway like mine. i also discover we have a cat and foxs coming by the driveway once in the wild.

Reviews.Title: Driveway alarm and wildlife sensor for yard
Reviews.Author: Auntie
Reviews.Content: It works fine.  Love that it's remote and requires no plug in to electricity. Great for alerting us as we have wildlife destroying our yard.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SECURITY FOR THE PRICE!!
Reviews.Author: Conservative
Reviews.Content: Great security for a very small price!!!  i recommend these to friends, family and business associates.... I would rather have these at several locations in my home than any high priced security system that you pay monthly for.  Only improvement I would like to see made is to have one monitor with different tones for each receiver you purchase.  Right now if I use several in the home when one goes off I am not certain which one it is.  I will gladly purchase more of these if they come out with multiple tones to select from.

Reviews.Title: With patience can be very effective.
Reviews.Author: Joe Cars
Reviews.Content: I've bought many of them. Even converted some to plug in adaptors. I use them around my property for both security and alerting me to when animals are attacking my bird feeders. It would be nice if there was a seperate indicator for low battery.Also they can be very false indicators in windy weather. However with time (and patience) I have learned to use them effectively. I've even ganged three of them together with a plug in adaptor so as to be loud enough to wake me. Yes would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Security Item
Reviews.Author: N. Thompson
Reviews.Content: We like to leave our doors open at night with the security screen door shut.  No one can come up to our front door without us knowing about it before they get there.  It is just as important as any lock on our door.

Reviews.Title: SEEMED OK, WORKED
Reviews.Author: L. E. WAGNER "ERIK"
Reviews.Content: WHAT MORE CAN I SAY? IT IS WHAT IT IS AND WHEN YOU NEED SOME THING YOU TRY FOR THE BEST PRICE BUT ALSO GOOD QUALITY

Reviews.Title: I was wrong to think about returnning this unit - terrific!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Dombrosky
Reviews.Content: Was going to return as docs said it had only a soft, pleasant chime for warning. Not true. On High setting, it would wake a hibernating Grizzley Bear. Then for less demanding signal, the soft, pleasant setting and OFF. orks very well to alert me if someone enters anywhere in my back yard with nefarious thoughts and goals. Read the tip about narrowing the field by adding strips of tape to the screen and one can customize it to exactly their requirements. I am buying another for another area I need covered. Very cheap for the function it fulfillf.

Reviews.Title: Great for alerting you to visitors of all kinds
Reviews.Author: xena
Reviews.Content: Excellent device. It chimes when it senses movement and it doesn't chime when you turn it on. We use it to let us know when bears are raiding our bird feeders as well as when our human guests are arriving.

Reviews.Title: great product had for years
Reviews.Author: R. Dehle
Reviews.Content: i got this b/c my daughter kept leaving her room and eatting durring the night. it worked perfectly to keep her in place and alert me to her leaving her room.

Reviews.Title: 5 Stars if the audio alarm still worked.
Reviews.Author: Rutzup
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of the Driveway Patrol Sensor Receiver kits. 1 on 1/26/2013 and 1 on 2/2 2013. I liked the first one so I ordered a second one. I especially liked how loud the audio alarm was on them. In July the audio alarm stopped working on both of them. I have tried replacing all the batteries and putting the units next to each other and I can not get the audio to work on either one.The LEDs in both work fine, it just the audio that does not work.If I find a way to get the audio to work I will update my review. If the audio was still working I would give the units 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Put them INSIDE your vehicle instead!!
Reviews.Author: ted o
Reviews.Content: I got this the other day.  It kept giving false signals, from the wind, or otherwise, I dont know....so, I thought about putting them INSIDE my cars, as really, this was the whole point of me getting them (I bought two).So, I put one sensor in each car, on the passenger doors armrest, I'm getting some velcro tape, and there they will sit.I tested em and as soon as either door is opened up, the signal is sent no problem.  I am on my way with a baseball bat.This way also the sensors are not exposed to any weather (they say they are waterproof, but i doubt it over time) and there is no wind to move em setting off the sensor etc.So for $15, you can't go wrong.  It suits my purpose at least.  No idea on how long these will last, but for $15...I was fortunate enough to have both sensors work with just one receiver.  I've read some do, some dont.  I plan on getting a power adaptor.  That's the only thing that's not included and should be

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Coberley
Reviews.Content: I'll have to say this product does work, it works to good.  It picks up animals birds and even the bushes blowing in the wind.  It don't discriminate.  Hopefully I can find a place I can put the sending unit where it don't pick up so many distractions.

Reviews.Title: Good when it works but unreliable.
Reviews.Author: I. Brown
Reviews.Content: Works great when it works, but then it breaks very easily.  I got two and both stopped working after a few months of use.

Reviews.Title: It is worth the money did the job for me.
Reviews.Author: gerry
Reviews.Content: If you have kids that get up in the middle of the night.  It's great in the house aswell as the driveway.

Reviews.Title: Highly satisfied
Reviews.Author: Carl Gobrick
Reviews.Content: I ordered this driveway patrol as a back up I have used the driveway patrol for several years,  and I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Works about half the time
Reviews.Author: Luckydogs
Reviews.Content: As others have said, it occasionally goes off with higher winds, which is ok with me, but what is not ok is how inconsistent it is. I even bought the dc power cord thinking that might help, but not at all. I would say it only works half the time, if that. Worked better for the first couple weeks, now I'm ready to search for a more reliable model. Doesn't do much good if it only works half the time...

Reviews.Title: Great for the money.
Reviews.Author: Simplebuyer
Reviews.Content: Works fine; setting of field of view is stated to be 20 degrees, a narrow focus.  I use it indoors.  Chimes are doorbell-like which upsets the dog.

Reviews.Title: Not very sensitive, will try a different type sensor.
Reviews.Author: E. Butler
Reviews.Content: I installed brand new batteries and set the product up on my mantel for a test. I walked right up to it to within about 6-feet and the alarm only sounded when I was directly in front of it.  Thirty degrees to the side and nothing, waved my hand at it and not a peep. At least the vendor creditied my credit card for the purchase price minus shipping. Lesson learned: Maybe I just got a lemon but in any case I'm NOT at all impressed with PIR technology. In my experience it (PIR) just does not seem to perform consistently.

Reviews.Title: False alarms
Reviews.Author: M. Small
Reviews.Content: Oh it works alright but it also has lots of false alarms.  I'm working with to try to locate it where it won't go off every five minutes.  Can't determine if its clouds, shadows or wind that causes it to go off so often.

Reviews.Title: This one really didn't do the job for us.
Reviews.Author: Donna Rawson
Reviews.Content: Even though it is positioned within the number of feet suggested, we had to move it much closer for it to work. Our solution is to buy another more powerful one (of another brand), and leave this one closer in toward the house. This sort of solves our problem of when deer or birds set off the alarm farther out. If we don't hear the signal from  this one shortly after the more powerful one, It's probably wildlife and we ignore it!

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol Sensor
Reviews.Author: Richard T Kushmaul
Reviews.Content: Performed as advertised!  Excellent price value.  Used as doorway sensor with chime in back room of a book store.  Notifies staff working in back room when someone enters the book store.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Rak
Reviews.Content: Not that great, for distance over 50 feet it don't work good at all.  If you have it the house has trouble signal going through walls.

Reviews.Title: They WORK
Reviews.Author: Kenneth W. Weigel
Reviews.Content: I have 4 of these mounted at every corner of the house.  They work very well, and I can SLEEP a lot better knowing what is going on outside.  It is like having a watchdog at every corner of your house 24 hours a day.  I had one unit fail out of the 6 I have purchased over the years, the others are all still working.

Reviews.Title: Already had one just replaced it after 7 years.
Reviews.Author: Dan Evans
Reviews.Content: As stated above replaced one that lasted 7 years. Works great as intended, when it goes off even the dog knows someone is here. Mainly got it for him to see (hear) when he comes back to the door to come in.

Reviews.Title: Works well for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jerry Z
Reviews.Content: I use this for my main entrance door. It works well with very few false alarms. For the price it works very well.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Williams "Ms. Capri"
Reviews.Content: I like the fact that we are aware whoever comes in our driveway and porch.  It makes us feel safer and more aware/

We just recently replaced number two with this purchase.  It sits under an eave, about 3 feet off the ground and alerts us to any backyard activity. Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Content: Quick shipping and very easy to set up, It is a little sensitive but it does exactly what it is supposed to do.  Going to order one for my office for the front door.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Gminaya
Reviews.Content: It's Just what I just looking for, sound great, I'll use the 4.5v battery.The reach it's perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work, short battery life

After about a week of it not working, I moved the sensor closer, but found that the receiver batteries were already dead. It had only been a week and it only beeped once or twice! They're Duracell batteries too, so I don't think that's the problem. I'm going to buy the DV cable and see if it works better when plugged into the wall...if not, I plan on getting a refund.

Reviews.Title: drive way alarm

Reviews.Title: Great product when its working...

Reviews.Content: it is nice and lets you know when someone approaches the house.. if pointed to the driveway, will let you know when someone comes up the driveway...

Reviews.Author: retta murawski
Reviews.Content: The first one I bought worked great I had to move it back a little on my porch because it was picking up cars going down the street. The second unit I purchased I cant get to work the light came on when I installed the batteries but no sound now the light wont come on.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Sensor

Reviews.Title: Great idea

Reviews.Content: Very sensitive. Even the moving leaves set it off. Had relocate the unit. Works very well now. Great to know when someone. Is approaching.

Reviews.Title: Sell your soul for a jelly roll!

Reviews.Title: ABSOLUTELY MARVELOUS
Reviews.Author: Joan Scarveles
Reviews.Content: This is truly a very wonderful product.  It is not obtrusive but does let you know when someone (or something) is in the area that you might want to know about.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol sensor and Receiver Kit
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Was everything it said it was came when it said it would Would tell anyone it is worth the money

Reviews.Title: no seperation
Reviews.Author: dave lindo
Reviews.Content: I bought two at the same time thinking they would be on different freq. Both alarms go off if either monitor is passed. I wanted separate signals But they work other than that.

Reviews.Title: Works good for me
Reviews.Author: Susan K
Reviews.Content: I got my first one of these years ago and it has been working fine.  I got the thing to alert me to bears coming onto the deck and have learned many things along the way.  One thing I learned early on is that you might need to tape off the left and right side of the sensor or it will pick up way too much motion.  I narrowed the window with electrical tape.  Also, tree limbs will set it off if you are not careful about placement.  I learned that putting the transmitter  inside of a quart size zipper bag will prolong the life of the unit and not interfere with the transmission.  This keeps it from getting damp and helps it to last longer.  If the "low" chime is too loud inside, wrap it in a towel and you can still hear it fine.  You can also put the receiver in a zip bag and leave it beside the transmitter and it will scare away the bears.  The only reason I am ordering another one is that last night the bear banged into the unit on his way onto the deck and pretty much totaled it.  Placement is important....too low and you get very small animals setting it off, too high and you get things that fly.  Set it for the height you want to alarm whether it is cars, bears, dogs or humans.  My neighbor uses hers in her mailbox to alert her to mail delivery.

Reviews.Title: Driveway motion detector
Reviews.Author: Gerald M.
Reviews.Content: This detector works great. It detects any movement in the field.  It will detect even animals moving thru the yard.

Reviews.Title: Goes off for no reason.
Reviews.Author: Barbara Still
Reviews.Content: It goes off when no one is there. I have moved it and it still goes off. I have covered part of it like it said to.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: WAYNE a. iRWIN
Reviews.Content: It is just what was needed to let us know when someone has entered our property.Thank you very much,Wayne Irwin

Reviews.Title: These are so so.
Reviews.Author: Customero
Reviews.Content: These tend to be overly sensitive and there is no way to adjust the sensitivity. This causes false alarms constantly and also causes the batteries in the sensors to die in a very short time. They would be okay to use on a tempory basis but they're not good for serious monitoring of a permanent nature.

Reviews.Title: Does not transmit effectively
Reviews.Author: Howard Slater
Reviews.Content: Ditance from receiver is not sufficiengt to reach my driveway. needs more power. Ineffective for my needs can I return it?

Reviews.Title: like it but...
Reviews.Author: COFFEY-HAMILTON :0)
Reviews.Content: my only wish is that it had a volume button. other than that it serves its purpose as intended. i would buy again

Reviews.Title: Love it Love it.
Reviews.Author: Janice L. Cunningham
Reviews.Content: We love this product because we are older and can't keep running down our long drive way to see if the mail has come yet.  I has helped us a great deal no mor wondering if the mail man has come now we know he has.

Reviews.Title: Functional but does not function as expected
Reviews.Author: T. G. WETZL "Sports Nut"
Reviews.Content: I was led to believe from a magazine article that if I placed the sensor inside the rear of my mailbox it would tranmit a signal to the receiver in my house when the mailbox was opened.  Apparently the signal does not reach inside my house which is somewhat elevated from the mailbox.  I don't know if that is the cause.  Distance is not an issue since it is 50-75 ft, much less than the stated range of 400'.  I have mounted the sensor on top, outside of the mailbox and the signal does reach the receiver ijnside the house but I don't know if now it will transmit when the mailbox area is approached, not just when it is opened.  I have reduced sensitivity by mask taping over some of the sensor "window".

Reviews.Title: Cheap Product
Reviews.Author: Timothy T. DePetro
Reviews.Content: The Receiver stopped working after only a few uses. If you buy this product, make sure you save your receipts and know the return policy.

Reviews.Title: Not reliable
Reviews.Author: Diane L Lawless
Reviews.Content: I owned one of these a few years ago and seemed to work fine until it got wet inside and quit working. I bought another one and had no luck getting it to work consistently so I abandoned it and bought a higher end model from another company. You get what you pay for and for about $20 it may or may not work for your particular situation. I wouldn't recommend it if you are able to afford a better one.

Reviews.Title: Lasted one month
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I placed the sensor on my front porch, completely sheltered from the elements. It worked like a dream, at first. After a month, the alarm started going off constantly, even though nothing was on my porch.  Finally, just turned it off.  I suppose if you need it for a short term, it would be useful. But, if you need something permanent, I recommend finding something better.

Reviews.Title: It's not quite as good as the last one I had.
Reviews.Author: StevoD
Reviews.Content: The unit was sending out false alarms-I can only assume it was reading the movement of tree branches opposite the sensor (they were at least 25 ft away). Other times it would read a passing vehicle even though the closest point of approach was at least 40 ft. I had to try masking some of the sensor opening to make it less sensitive, but then it would detect movement only sporadically.This is the second Driveway Patrol unit I have installed. The first one had the same sensitivity issues but was more reliable in sending a signal to the receiver.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a super product!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Goslawski "joegos"
Reviews.Content: This product worked perfectly out of the box with the addition of batteries (not included). No setup or programming necessary!:0)

Reviews.Title: Nice early warning system
Reviews.Author: Chris Vincent
Reviews.Content: This system is being used inside a building that has only two offices in use on the floor. With this it is possible to know if someone is wandering about. The distance is not great so I can't varify true distance but it does 30 feet inside just fine.

Reviews.Title: wonderful

Reviews.Content: I have bought these through out the years and am very pleased.the weather depends on how long they would work, so we made a wooden box around themand they last over a year. great to know when someone drives or walks by .....well worth the money

Reviews.Title: Great sell and fast shipping

Reviews.Content: It's great only down side is birds can set it off but sooooooo worth it anyone that has a large house or would like to know before someone get to. Door his is the way to go. Make sure you buy the plug hat goes to it had to go to he store to get one.

Reviews.Title: Works well.

Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift. It works very well indeed, perhaps a little too well. Cats set it off, so place it at least three or four feet off the ground. The only beef I have is that while it is equipped with a AC adapter receptacle, it does not come with the charger. Soon after receiving it, Amazon sent me an E-Mail with a " bargain" offer for the charger for it. That's just tacky and deceptive. I am a very loyal Amazon customer, but, much more of that kind of "marketing" and I won't be much longer.

Reviews.Title: Good protection.
Reviews.Author: Bill E.
Reviews.Content: I live in the woods with a very long driveway. This does the trick. Per others, I had to tape over a portion of the sensor due to all the wildlife triggering the unit. Works great.

Reviews.Title: Patrol Sensor
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: So far, this product works great.  It's nice to know that the alarm will sound in the house when you're sleeping and alert you to anything happening outside.

Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to purchase this because of the AS SEEN ON TV title. It does it's job, pop in the batteries and set up the distance and away it goes. Works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol Sensor and Receiver Kit

My original unit worked in doors and out continuously with out fail. It was the least expensive of all the monitors that I used, and the very best.  I have just ordered and received two new units. I have only one regret concerning this model, it does make provision for multiple units slaved to one receiver.  I highly recommend this unit, and would gladly buy again.

For the price, it is not a complete loss but there may be better options out there that work better.

This alerts me to their arrival so I can meet them at the front door :)  You might have to 'fine-tune' the location.  Mine was working 60% of the time upon their arrival and 100% on their departure. A move of a few inches did the trick :) I turn the receiver OFF when I have no customers scheduled.  It DOES 'alert' to birds, dogs, etc :)  I put mine in an old birdhouse with the front removed to give some weather protection.  I am very happy and the price was great :)

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol Senson

Reviews.Title: Driveway Alarm/Motion Detector

Every time birds fly by, the buzzer goes off.  Then even when I drive in my own driveway, sometimes it goes off and sometimes it doesn't (There is an LED on the sensor where you can see if the alarm sounds).  I don't turn mine on anymore.  It would probably work better in the trash can.  That's were this mind end up.  DON'T PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT.I gave this a one star but it doesn't deserve one.

Reviews.Title: like it fine
Reviews.Author: sm
Reviews.Content: This Driveway Patrol Sensor works really well....but if the wind is blowing it sets off bogus alarms.  But other than that, it works great!  =)

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Jeepers
Reviews.Content: Product hasn't let anyone enter the driveway undetected. Has a couple false alarms every day but after tweaking the placement and partially covering the motion sensor it works almost flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: DRIVEWAY PATROL WORKS
Reviews.Author: LEON H YAWN
Reviews.Content: I received my product ahead of time and it works as advertised.  I bought it for my sister who lives alone.It works well and is very sensitive.

Reviews.Title: Surpassed
Reviews.Author: Emery  Morley "GreyRider"
Reviews.Content: I wanted something that would alert me if someone drove up, and this item surpassed all I was hoping for. I do suggest a housing to prevent weather to unit, I used a 6in PVC pipe. Well worth the money and highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Sensing
Reviews.Content: This is wonderful.  It lets me know when someone is in the driveway.  It has a low and loud alarm.  I purchasedthree of these.  One for my aunt who does not hear very well.  With the receiver on loud, she does not have anyproblem hearing it.  Will buy again.

Reviews.Title: WORKS GREAT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: lynn a minniti
Reviews.Content: I use this item inside the house as a warning if anyone enters. So far, no false alarms, and it seems to work great. I turn it off every morning, and turn the sender towards the wall. That way the battery last a lot longer, not trying to send all the time. Good buy!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Will detect Movenment up to 20-30 feet.
Reviews.Author: PopPop "PopPop"
Reviews.Content: I Bought one to signal to receiver unit near the front door so it works when someone is walking up.  Sunlight makes it go off. A little squirrel made it go off one day. I went back and bought two more of them. Now I have one on a tree in my yard, One on railing steps down to my house and one pointed at my garage door.  I put one of the three receivers in my front window on the inside, out of the rain and another one inside the garage hanging on a previous nail in the wall.  When two chimes go off, I know someone of my family has left the house and is going into the garage.  The mailman never sneaks up on me anymore. People visiting in small Golf carts alert me in the driveway (tree) and when they start down the steps.  By having three of these cheap transmitters I can figure out from what goes off, the person(s) coming to see me even when I am in the back of the house. One caveat though.  Be sure to buy the extra $15 power supply (costs as much as the device, huh?) because the 3 "C" batteries do not last a week in use. AND I put only the one INSIDE the house on a timer so it cannot wake me at night. Dumb, but I sleep well.  It cuts on at 7am, off at midnight. The garage is on all night and day.I may buy another one to put somewhere else.  If I was going to rob my house and I heard all this on the outside I may decide to go somewhere else like on the edge of the house, I would figure if they had this much crap going on they have a house detector as well.  And they would be right, ...because I do. Over all rating Thumbs up.  Not five stars because of the range, but, hey, it's only a $15 item.

Reviews.Title: A MUST HAVE
Reviews.Author: ANTHONY PIZARRO
Reviews.Content: FOR THE PRICE THESE ARE GREAT LITTLE DEVICES. I DO NOT USE THEM FOR THE DRIVEWAY BUT AT TWO ENTRANCES TO THE HOUSE. I HAVE BOUGHT RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES FOR THE DETECTOR AND CHIME WHICH IS THE BEST WAY TO KEEP THE PRICE DOWN. THE RANGE IS REALLY GREAT. IN MY SECOND FLOOR BEDROOM I AM ALERTED BY ANYONE APPROACHING EITHER DOOR. ONE THING I DID NOT REALIZE IS THAT YOU HAVE ONLY ONE FREQUENCY TO TRANSMIT ON. SO, BOTH CHIMES GO OFF IF ONE DETECTOR IS TRIGGERED. IT WOULD BE NICE TO SET AT LEAST THREE FREQUECIES

Reviews.Title: Really simple and delicate
Reviews.Author: Amazotron
Reviews.Content: I've had two of these for over four years and they work well for where I've placed them. They are rather cheaply made. The battery contacts broke when removing a 9-volt battery. I'm not sure how well it works in weather because while mine are outside and I live in a very humid area, they are kept out of the rain.  The only reason I'm considering getting another brand is simply to have a different chime to hear so I can differentiate which motion detector is tripped.  When the batteries get low, the unit will chime repeatedly until they are changed out. The loudest setting is really loud, loud enough to be heard outside when people approach a porch or are near a window, so that could be a deterrent itself.  I have yet to notice anyone noticing the sensor where I have it mounted; it would be easy for someone to remove it.  Unlike the picture, my sensor has the "Driveway Patrol" name printed on it.

Reviews.Title: Beeps!
Reviews.Author: Brenda R. McGinnis
Reviews.Content: I love the idea but have never been able to get it where it works correctly.  Moved it several times and it keeps beeping no matter where I put it and nothing is there!

Reviews.Title: This is my second one, first one lasted years
Reviews.Author: Farshad
Reviews.Content: This item is awesome... and I'd give it a 5 (thought I had already), but alas I left my first one in the old house and the new one died after a single day while the last set worked for many years.Hopefully that's a fluke.  Returning the dead one and ordered a new one.

Reviews.Title: best alert device
Reviews.Author: revdona
Reviews.Content: I use this item on my screened porch, that way I can leave my sliding doors open all day and I'll always know when I get "company." I have owned a driveway alarm since 2005. Yet, nothing lasts forever so needed a new one, The alert signal has been improved, now it is less piercing, a little more melodious, but still alerts you to someone approaching. Best protection for the money. I love it.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Silvers
Reviews.Content: The Driveway Patrol Sensor and Receiver Kit does a good job. I would definetly recommend this product to my friends.

Reviews.Title: it's ok
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Bressler
Reviews.Content: it worked fine just a bit to sensitive to wind moving trees and bushes. has it's use in covered areas.

Reviews.Title: Works ok for a while.
Reviews.Author: B. Hall
Reviews.Content: I bought two sets of these sensors and installed one and kept the other as a backup. It worked fine for about 6 months and then the receiver just stopped working, so I installed the backup set and it had the same problem after about 8 months, The Trademark 82-3731 Driveway Patrol sold here on Amazon is a much better set for just a few dollars more.

Reviews.Title: Needs sensitivity adjustment
Reviews.Author: erik b. prestbury
Reviews.Content: The motion sensor works like a charm, but it needs to have some sort of dial for adjustable range and sensitivity. It could also use a silent mode where the receiver's lights flash with no alarm sound for when I'm working right next to it and can see the yard through the window.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Product!
Reviews.Author: Frank Campione
Reviews.Content: These little units serve the purpose of alerting us that someone/something is on the property, particularly in our blindspot & backyard, and the cost of them can't be beat. I would recommend this item to anyone who wants a heads-up that someone is on or approaching your property.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Driveway sensor and receiver kit
Reviews.Author: bestillandknowGod
Reviews.Content: What I like or dislike:like: nothingdislike: extremely small and does not work. It appears to be more like a toy for kids to play with in the house to hear a noise when you have to be right up on the sensor. Do not buy please do not waste your money. Wish I could return. Trying to ask Amazon and the company about the UPS pick up for return products without having to pay for the shipping. I will update my comment once I am able to return this product that does not work for driveway security as stated.

Reviews.Title: Bad Product
Reviews.Author: flimia
Reviews.Content: It turns on by itself (nothing moving in front , no people, no animals, no tree branches)A totally waste of my money and my time !!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Very sensitive
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: The only problem I have with this product it is extremely sensitive.  Clouds moving overheard, birtds flying in front of it, or the cats set it off. But it works wonderful.

Reviews.Title: does basic job
Reviews.Author: DARRELL SHEPHERD
Reviews.Content: This does the basic job,  i do not know how long the batteries will last and the install location does not have outlet..

Reviews.Title: Deceiving statistics
Reviews.Author: Harvey "HK"
Reviews.Content: New unit with new batteries, and a clear unobstructed distance for signal between sensor and receiver is 135 feet, not 400..Signal will not pass over 75 feet through walls.Sensor does not detect a large vehicle passing 20 feet away. It does work but very minamally usefullness.

Reviews.Title: Additional Home Security Help
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: This is a great way to keep unwanted visitors off your property.For more information on how to keep your home and family safe, try this: [...]It was very helpful while we were deciding on how to protect our family

Reviews.Title: Not the best.
Reviews.Author: Debby McCann
Reviews.Content: It does not always work. Cars come in and out without it ringing and it does give off false alarms often!

Reviews.Title: It works for the most part
Reviews.Author: Carol Peters
Reviews.Content: I only have one problem with this item. My unit does not work up to 400 feet like the box says. My driveway is less than 200 feet but I only get a signal at about 30 feet. It does work just not as I expected it to and I don't get the extra couple of minutes warning I was looking for when I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Works as described.
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: I have it by the front door for now until the snow melts.  I have tested it up to 100 feet and it works.  Nice product if this is what you are looking for.  Can be VERY sensitive.  Read the other reviews and instructions to fix that.  I haven't had that need as of yet.  d:-)

Reviews.Title: Sensitivity
Reviews.Author: Dee D.
Reviews.Content: Got this to warn me of folks/cars coming into my driveway, BUT it also sounds off when ANY in line of (within 20 to 25 feet) site moving trees or fences.and when animals jump in front of it, other than that it works fine

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Very reliable product. I the only thing I wish it had was other chime sounds. This unit comes with one sound and it plays itself three times. I think one or two times is enough. But overall, great deal!

Reviews.Title: Buy a chamberlin
Reviews.Author: Flyboy
Reviews.Content: These are not a very good alarm, they have many bugs, and you will shut it off, more then you will use it!buy a chamberlin for a few buck more and you will never live with out it.I have 3 of these units, because of replacements, and none of them work right.I took the chamnerlin out of the box, set it up and it has worked perfect... plus it has the option to addsensors with a auto learn function.. I now have for sensors each report to the same base with it's own chime..if you want a cheap one, may as well get the one from harbor fright for 9 bucks becasue it works better then this unit will.....sorry to say these are a complete waiste of money............

Reviews.Title: Sensor
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: I use this product on my carport to alert me if someone is approaching. I'm surprised at the range. It does quite well.

Reviews.Title: Does what it is supposed to do
Reviews.Author: Jean L. Bell
Reviews.Content: Easy to install.  Alarm sound loud enough.  Would like it to have a way to have the alarm ring only once instead of three times.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Pookie Joe
Reviews.Content: love these things, but they are all on same transmit channel, so when you try to use more than one unit (set) in same location, i.e. one for driveway and one for alley, one sensor sets off both receivers so you don't know which on is sensing someone.I will figure something out to get both to work, and still love these things for price and operation

Reviews.Title: driveway patrol
Reviews.Author: Harley
Reviews.Content: This arrived today it has a lot of false alarms we are in the process of trying to work those out we have  had two of these the first one was like this and liked it very much the second different and it lasted 2 months not happy so i went back to the one we liked not real sure about it yet need to try and work out the kinks..  well was not able to work out the kinks this item is broken or just junk did not work at all false alarm all the time it was on.. will not buy another one of these kind of to bad liked our first one quite well.. my money was returnen quickly!

Reviews.Title: Great detect
Reviews.Author: DPBOSS
Reviews.Content: I bought this to be alerted if any one steps into my porch.  It lets me know immediately when the mail man, delivery person or anyone else steps into the porch area.  Need to get another one for the garage area.

Reviews.Title: warns me
Reviews.Author: Anil Wortz
Reviews.Content: This alarm is very good at letting me know if a car is in front of my house. It is not perfect, (as it senses limbs) for example, on a windy day. I highly recommend a power adapter, unless you use rechargables instead. It sometimes goes out of sych with itself, but overall, great security, and lets me know when the mail/fed ex arrives.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Vicky Kaufman
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use for my Dad. He has Alzheimer disease and sometimes gets up at night and starts throwing food out or other things.  I set this on my dryer and he has to pass through that area to get to anywhere besides bedrooms and bath.  I put the chime next to my bed so I know when he gets up and I can get up, too. Much more restful!

Reviews.Title: Product is performing up to expectation
Reviews.Author: Leonard Wagner
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product primarily for the purpose of providing protection for my vehicles parked on my driveway. Upon installing the equipment, two of my neighbours requested that I ordered them the same equipment, which I did, and received promptly, and have since been advised by my two neighbours, that the equipment is functioning well, and they are pleased with the reslts of their purchase.

Reviews.Title: Used at my Business
Reviews.Author: Tasha Chorba
Reviews.Content: When I'm in the back filing I can't tell when some one comes in.  This thing works but I have a few things I don't like.Cons:  First is that is drains batteries very quickly.  There is no battery indicator to tell you that it is low so you never know until it just stops working.  I have to replace the batteries often.  Second is the volume control.  There is High, low, and off.  The high is to loud and the low is not loud enough.  I even put duck tape over the speaker to dull the sound of the high and it is still to loud.Pros:  It works over a good distance.  It picks up most movement and it only misses movement when the batteries are low.  I use is often and I like it.

Reviews.Title: Great security device
Reviews.Author: gloria mashon
Reviews.Content: I bought the Driveway Patrol Sensor to place at the gate to our garden home property.  Now I know immediately if someone is entering the gate.  It makes me feel secure knowing when someone enters.

Reviews.Title: very good if i didnt have a cat that like to play with it
Reviews.Author: barry pilgrim
Reviews.Content: it work very well but when my cat wants to play with it it goes off at night all the time

Reviews.Title: It simply works!
Reviews.Author: Gary Boucher "Gary"
Reviews.Content: Install the batteries, hang them up and turn on. You're all set! Works as advertised. Thinking about buying another one.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: jespi59jr
Reviews.Content: Does the works! but consume to much battery, so I'm looking to add an electrical DC 4.5v connection for better performant.

Reviews.Title: It's a Bargain
Reviews.Author: tim armstrong
Reviews.Content: work's perfect and it's easy to hide. For the price, I think it's worth buying one or two more to cover the whole property.

Reviews.Title: Security at a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: John Mark "Host of BookMinistry"
Reviews.Content: I use my drievway alert every day for the last two or three months to let me know when someone is approaching the house. It wasn't expensive, but has done a good job. Sometimes, especially in the afternoon, there's more flying insects around that set it off, so I just turn it off. I did have to limit it's view, but that information was clearly explained in various reviews I read prior to my purchase. When I'm in my office at the back of the house, when the driveway alarm goes off, I simply click my video player/recorder on my PC which is hooked up to my video surveillance camera to see what set it off. No need to get up, go to the other end of the house to look out the window.

Reviews.Title: JUNK JUNK JUNK JUNK
Reviews.Author: brett
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT AT LEAST 7 OF THESE  THEY ALL DIDNT WORK  OR DIDNT WORK RIGHT  OR STOPPED WORKING AFTER 3 WEEKS  SO NO TIME TO RETURN AFTER ALMOST A WEEK TO RECEIVE  AND TRYING NEW BATERIES AND BUSY WITH FAMILY  PLUS  I DONT WANT TO WASTE MORE MONEY AND TIME TO SEND BACK  TELEBRAND HOW BOUT REINBURST ME  FOR MY TIME AND MONEY SPENT  OH  I WASTED A WHOLE 7 DAYS DAY N NIGHT HIDING OUT  WAITING FOR CROOK TO COME BACK  I SEEN SNOW PRINTS  ALARM DIDNT WORK  N I WAS HOME  A WEEK LATER I FOUND OUT IT WAS MY AUNT TO SHOW ME HER NEW CAR  THESE ALARMS CAUSED ME ALOT TROUBLE  IN TOTAL  IVE HAD 7 OF THESE  ALARMS  NO MORE  I SHOULD WRITE AT LEAST 7 REVIEWS  UNLESS TELEBRANDS PAYS ME BACK..

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I set this up next to my front door looking passed it and toward my side gate. It senses motion of anyone walking up to my front door, as well as anyone openeing my side gate (about 20ft from front door in straight line). Unfortunately it also senses any cat walking from gate to door, but oh well. I will try the scotch tape method to stop false alerts. This works great and would recomend to anyone looking for a little heads up alert of anyone approaching.

Reviews.Title: Driveway patrol
Reviews.Author: Sassy
Reviews.Content: I really like the patrol but it go off for no reason I wish it. It would work correctly. I have about 5 people looking at it but it don't. Work right. Would like try another to see if it worked better. It really a neat device if would work right

Reviews.Title: driveway sensor
Reviews.Author: Shelley Fox
Reviews.Content: it beeps every time a bird flys or a leaf moves and when sensor was adjusted it did not pick up walking by

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Maryann McPhail
Reviews.Content: I use the patrol sensor  inside my home to alert me when my ailing mother leaves her room. I could assist her quickly so she doesn't fall.

Reviews.Title: driveway patrol
Reviews.Author: Yogesh N. Badiani "yb"
Reviews.Content: good productmy device is not sensing cars passing @ more than 15 m.p.hour.Otherwise i would have given 5 starsrest is ok

Reviews.Title: Not too sensitive and the alarm is not very loud
Reviews.Author: T. Clem "bioengr"
Reviews.Content: It does sense approaching people and vehicles (and animals) most of the time, but you must have the alarm very near to hear it.

Reviews.Title: worth it!
Reviews.Author: Kari
Reviews.Content: The product worked great. I will buy this product again in the future. I am very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Tjay
Reviews.Content: It claims to work up to 400 feet..I can only get it up to 50 feet. My driveway is only 300 feet. This is a bad product

Reviews.Title: Stop the thief before he breaks into your car or home
Reviews.Author: michael k sher
Reviews.Content: I use this at work to get a heads up when the boss is arriving.Im going to catch the next guy who trys to break into my car!

Reviews.Title: I live in the boonies..........
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: and these are great to have. You just have to hook it up in a place where there is no movement (tree branches etc) but they are loud and you can turn it down if need be. I have it on all day so I can leave my door open.  I have this unit far enough away that if it sounds off from an unexpected visitor I have time to slam my door shut and get my 38 special ready. I have 4 of these, I love them.  Motion of any kind will set them off so you just have to find a good place to put them.

Reviews.Title: It's ...........ok
Reviews.Author: Person
Reviews.Content: I've tried every position possible to make this thing work. If the wind blows, the sensor picks up the limbs blowing on our neighbors yard and it sets the beeper off. I've changed positions from the front of the garage to the side of the house. My objective was to be forewarned when someone pulled in our drive. I've finally found just the right spot, but not every time when there is movement does it work. You can walk right in front of it and it won't set off the beeper.  BE alerted, that this beeper unit can also be plugged into the wall............HOWEVER that is NOT supplied and you have to purchase the AC adapter. It's all plastic and you don't have a fortune in the thing, so it's not going to respond like an more expensive unit.

Reviews.Title: Needed Sensor for Drive
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: This sensor is a great idea but the motion picks up other things besides someone coming down the drive. I live in the country and the buzzing on a windy day drove me crazy.

Reviews.Title: Works OK
Reviews.Author: Dave Curtis "DC"
Reviews.Content: Works OK for a few days, but runs out of battery power too quickly, lots of false alarms, even with side blinders added.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Sensor
Reviews.Author: sam jones
Reviews.Content: The Driveway Sensor is just what I wanted. Now nothing comes dowm my driveway without me knowing it. I'm very plesed with the Patrol Sensor!

Reviews.Title: Defective Unit
Reviews.Author: Michael Sisk
Reviews.Content: The on-off  button does not function properly.  Seems not to work like my 1st one. Very bad unit, But I think its defective.

Reviews.Title: hi
Reviews.Author: Cedric O. Groomes
Reviews.Content: thanks i enjoy doing business with you all,keep up the good work.the iitem was in good shap, every thing was on time

Reviews.Title: Works good
Reviews.Author: Caligal
Reviews.Content: For the price it has worked well for me! Does what it's supposed to and am happy with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: poorly made
Reviews.Author: joseph p
Reviews.Content: The unit I received is much to inconsistent. Sometimes it works othertimes it does not. Its as if the sensor goes into sleep mode. I was trying to use it indoors to alert me when someone was walking into my office and had it set by the entrance. My office was about 25 feet away and behind one wall. Would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Price is right
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: This "alarm" is a basic device that can alert you to anything that passes through it's beam.  I found when set off, it sounds like my wireless doorbell.  It does have 2 settings for sound  - high and low and has an off switch as well.  Other reviews have advised using good batteries that last longer and I agree. . .I may buy additional ones as they are priced reasonably for the quality that they are.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol
Reviews.Author: Nanachehaw "SkyFlyer"
Reviews.Content: Have used this product for over 5 years and it is time to replace it.  It has been very reliable and effective as far as home security for my family.  Some problems experienced but nothing that could not be corrected with help from the manufacturers.

Reviews.Title: Not for us
Reviews.Author: Ruth Brown
Reviews.Content: I didn't like it -it didn't work as it said it would.  Sorry to say that but I'm sorry it didn't as we needed something like this.

Reviews.Title: Good, but not Great
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I have had 5 of these Sensors.  They operate for a week or two, then they begin to fail.  Some have set the alarm off every few minutes even if the unit is covered, and others wouldn't work at all.  Two were returned, two were thrown out, and one remains which is turned off most of the time because it also sets the alarm off even when the scnsor is covered.

Reviews.Title: It does exactly what I was looking for it to do.
Reviews.Author: Stanley E. Kessler
Reviews.Content: It does exactly what I was looking for it to do.This was a great find. The price was the best I’ve found.

Reviews.Title: One of the better ones.
Reviews.Author: Clinton W Armstrong
Reviews.Content: This is one of the ones of this type of monitor.  I have several bout at various places and have not always been happy with the less expensive ones in local stores.  I found this one here and it is my old buddy.  I suggest be wary and thoughtful of the mounting location as I have found squirrels, the neighbors climbing cat, and even roadway traffic can set one off.  They have quite a range of distance.

Reviews.Title: good price.
Reviews.Author: Kathleen
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery,package well. I got it  to give to a friend that needed a little extra protection and didn't have the money for the big priced security system and needed something right away. Gives my friend a little peace of mind and I was glad I remembered I used this years ago. Works really well.

Reviews.Title: Detects animals, not vehicles
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I have a long driveway and wanted to know if a vehicle was approaching the house.  The sensor picks up passing animals and pedestrians but has yet to register a passing vehicle, whether large or small.  I have tried it at different locations and heights but it still ignores vehicles.  It seems to work well for monitoring animal movements but, sadly, is useless for the intended purpose of alerting when a vehicle approaches.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Paul Dunphy
Reviews.Content: The price was right. Read the otherreviews re limitations so I knew what I was buying. No bells or whistles

Reviews.Title: Know when people come to your door!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Cat "Patient Advocate"
Reviews.Content: I know when my dog is running up the driveway (and possibly out of the yard) & I know when the mail comes or other people before they get to the door! Yes, there are a lot of false alarms such as cats & birds. But what do you expect for $15.I think it's awesome. No more "Sorry we missed you" notes. Now I get all my packages.Added bonus, a burglar hears the alarm will probably decide to pass your home!

Reviews.Title: Execellent Buy seen others for 3X as much
Reviews.Author: Ray Gintling
Reviews.Content: Works great, I'm using it to wake me when a deer passes by ALSO. Its all you really need. I'm happy

Reviews.Title: Not Great
Reviews.Author: Amber Kelsey
Reviews.Content: The items stopped working after three months of using them. I ordered two of them and neither work any longer.

Reviews.Title: sensor
Reviews.Author: handtalker55
Reviews.Content: Got this for the driveway rural area. works well.We put it in a bird feeder to hide it somewhat. The face is open on the feeder. The sensor does have a red light come on when you go past it. If someone looking for an alert system, then the red light a dead giveaway. The reciever has a low and high setting for alert. love that. Guess if you want something softer, put a little scotch tape over the speaker perhaps.would recommend to anyone needed alerts for passing by it.For the price, it's great! Cons, we had to have the receiver facing the window to get it to catch a signal. Slightly up hill from the sending unit, so maybe that's why.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol Sensor...
Reviews.Author: Gerald Murphy
Reviews.Content: Seems to work fine so far.  Especially considering the price.  It is a little sensitive to wind movement but that is not a serious problem.  Better placement would help I'm sure.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Derek Griffith
Reviews.Content: nice item. price is good. couldnt have asked for anything more. i was pleased with the overall purchase and everything.

Reviews.Title: Part time security
Reviews.Author: Wade Guice
Reviews.Content: The unit doesn't catch every vehicle coming into my drive, therefore, there is a false sense of security and that can be a very dangerous thing.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work correctly
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: We get false alerts when no one is there, and works only @ 20% of the time when someone is there.

Reviews.Title: ITEM DEFECTIVE
Reviews.Author: Mitlon C White
Reviews.Content: The item worked perfect for the first three days than stop working. The red sensor light came on and would not shut off and now will not come on at all. Batteries are all new.THANKS FOR ASKING'm WHITE

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: B. Marriott
Reviews.Content: I got this for a friend in the UK. He couldn;t find anything like ti over there. Considering getting one for me as he says it works better than described

Reviews.Title: Good product but not great!
Reviews.Author: Dale Steedley
Reviews.Content: I read other reviews where people had problems with the sensor going off more than it should. I on the other hand have had the opposite problem. It would not go off when it should. I had to put the receiver in a window and move the outside sensor around until I found a place where it would receive the signal at all. Still... it will work if you find that perfect place.

Reviews.Title: driveway sensor
Reviews.Author: Daniel Allen "sakura petals ok"
Reviews.Content: The driveway sensor alarm is worth the money. It detects everything that crosses its path. I put mine on the driveway and it catches people and vehicles, somtimes animals that are small can get past it, but for the most part it works good. i recommend this for security

Reviews.Title: Nice Gadget
Reviews.Author: Chappy
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and nice price. It was packaged well and met my expectations. It gives a sense of security.

Reviews.Title: Not 100% reliable
Reviews.Author: JJreader
Reviews.Content: I got this for my hubby as a gift. He wanted to know when someone entered our driveway before they rang the doorbell.It works pretty well, but sometimes goes off for no apparent reason (birds? squirrels?) and occasionally will not sound when it should. But works most of the time.The alarm is plenty loud to hear around the house.A fair deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Less than one star
Reviews.Author: Ron P
Reviews.Content: Absolute waste of time and money. I installed this on the front of my garage to catch anyone coming up the drive. My daughter backed out of the driveway in a 3500# car and it never went off. False alarms every couple of hours. It woke me up twice the first night before I turned it off. WARNING ON THIS PRODUCT - DO NOT BUY. It's coming back Amazon.

Reviews.Title: close enough to perfect as possible
Reviews.Author: alice griggs
Reviews.Content: First one we got over 25 yrs ago went off without reason.  More current ones don't.  We have had them last 10yr in the Florida sun, heat & humidity.  Well priced also.  We have one on our patio pointing to the back door and front door.  Can be used indoors also.  The two volume levels are nice but indoors it is too loud so I put a sock over it to muffle it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Todd Kursah
Reviews.Content: Had a lot of theft in the back of the house.  Set one of these up to catch the suspect stealing.  I work like a charm.  Battery lasted about 5 months for the sensor.

Reviews.Title: Unit was Defective
Reviews.Author: Melinda
Reviews.Content: The chime unit(motion sensor) did not alert properly, the light would come on, but it would not alert the receiver unless the chime unit was handled.There is no phone number for the product or seller (BIGFLYSPORTS). So there is no way to get a replacement or return without going through a rigmarole with Amazon. It took up the better part of an afternoon and still I have to go to the Post Office to mail it back.The unit I got did not match the picture, the one sent was tan with "driveway patrol" on the chime unit, You do need a drill and screw driver to install. I wish it wasn't such a gamble to re-order, unless you call and complain, you basically loose your money if the product is defective.

Reviews.Title: alarms on every thing
Reviews.Author: S. PHILLIPS "Yobro"
Reviews.Content: If you want to know when the wind blows or the sun creates a shadow or any thing else moves,dogs cats a branch across the street then this for you..it might work well in a dark closet or pantry tool room as a several warning,but not for driveway for sure..in my junk bin now...

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: rock
Reviews.Content: very good works very well install in back of house even picks up cats & dogs  great piece of equipment

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: adrienne
Reviews.Content: We use the sensor in our detached garage to let us know if the door is opened. So far, it has worked perfectly

Reviews.Title: Works very good!  Water proof the easy quick cheap way!
Reviews.Author: My 2 cent's
Reviews.Content: Ok everybody i have been reading all these reviews and no one discovered what i did! Ok i found that the transmitter will not go through glass. So putting it in a jar will not work to protect it from rain sleet heavy fog snow etc. Fog could be worse than rain because it could draw damp inside.  But what i found is that the signal goes through plastic just fine!!!!! I use a clear plastic sandwich bag and tape it shut and it works very good. Now you need to put the bag on like you would put on a car cover (Drape it down over the top) then tape it at the bottom and around the screw. If you use the dollar store clear shiny tape or packing tape it holds very well and you have to tear the bag to change the battery the tape will not come loose. That will protect your transmitters even from blowing rain. I did not test all kinds of plastic but it works even with thick soft plastic. The kind of container lunch meat comes in with the snap on lid. It works to 20 feet or more with baggies to detect movement. I did not test for long distance between transmitter and reciever but if someone does please post the results. Very thin plastic wrap may work even better for distance?  I have had my driveway alerts for 14 months and they are working very good. one other review here said they had one that worked for 5 years. For the price they can't be beat!!! When the transmitter battery gets down to about 6 volts it will start alarming constant because it does not have enough power to reset itself. Alot of people are complaining about birds and deer and dogs and cats setting it off well that is what the sensor should do! It is a PIR sensor that is what it does detect heat. Even the ones that cost much more will still pick up dogs and deer. Unless you get a very pricey one then it may not give as many false alarms.  But as said here in a recent review that if you take some time and point the sensor correct it will greatly reduce the false alarms. It is a good idea to put it in a bird house to hide it and protect it from the rain. I think it is great for security. This could alert you BEFORE someone gets in your house. Then they can not sneek up on you when you are asleep! You will have a advantage because you will be ready for them and you know the house better than they do! And then you can take them OUT!!!!! OH YES YOU CAN!!!!  A burglary happens every 14 seconds in the US. (Google it) I like it because it is 100% wireless and the batterys in the reciever are still working after 14 months! You can also plug it into a 4.5 volt adaptor. I turn it off when away and in the day unless i am expecting someone. I bought 3 and think they are very good for the price $7.00 for the transmitter and $7.00 for the reciever.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: kmf
Reviews.Content: This thing stopped working about a week after I put it up.  I used it inside for a hall door.  So it was never even outside.  It's garbage. Don't waste your money, just buy the good one first.

Reviews.Title: New use for Driveway Patrol
Reviews.Author: nonamenow
Reviews.Content: For several years I took care of my mother who had Alzheimer's.  Often she would get up in the middle of the night to go outside or do something around the house.  Her wondering around led to falling and eventually to a broken hip.  I bought the Driveway Patrol and set it up in her room so it would alert me to when she got out of bed. I set it up so it would go off if she got to the foot of the bed.  This way she could turn over, or sit up in bed without the alarm going off.  After getting the Driveway Patrol, I was able to sleep at night knowing that the Driveway Patrol was on patrol.  I like it so much that I plan to buy one for a friend whose trailer was broken into and her livelihood was stolen.

Reviews.Title: best thing I ever did
Reviews.Author: Linda P. Scott "Ms Pearl"
Reviews.Content: I know when someone walks into my driveway.No skills needed. All you need is batteries and a screwdriver .I have had this for many months now without replacing the batteries unlike some battery powered products

Reviews.Title: Stairway warning
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Roberts
Reviews.Content: Put this on the stairs up to my office. Works great, feel secure knowing folks are coming up stairs cause the stairs and floor are so solid I couldn't hear before ...

Reviews.Title: Amazingly Strong signal reception
Reviews.Author: Zynx Acrop
Reviews.Content: Excellent distance for such a small product.  Recommend the item be placed in a tube of sorts to keep the signal beam pointed more accurately for it to be broken then a signal sent to the receiver.  But all in all a great product for it's price.  Will look to buy a few more around my large land locked home.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Jean H. Pritchett
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with this product.  We have a long driveway and the Driveway Patrol notifies us when someone comes upto our home.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Bri
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing. It works very well. I never miss when someone is coming up the driveway. Definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: very sensitive
Reviews.Author: Timothy J. Brown "Tim Brown"
Reviews.Content: A little too sensitive,but works good,bought to replace one gone bad,would rather it buzzed or rang than playing music,but acceptable

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Deborah R. Berry "Handwalker"
Reviews.Content: Great product easy to use. I am aware of visitors arriving before they arrive at the door. I will use one on my camper.

Reviews.Title: Does not always beep when cars go by.
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: The monitor does not always pick up cars that come up our driveway. Yet, sometimes it beeps when the dogs walks by. Not sure whats going on...

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Klaus D. Weinhold
Reviews.Content: There might be some problems, I cannot judge now: 1. Lifetime of Battery? 2. Waterprotection (rain/fog/high huminity)?3. Sensitivity for false alarm in respect of cats, dogs?

Reviews.Title: One of those "how did we live without this?" items
Reviews.Author: C. A. Gibson
Reviews.Content: In the warmer months we leave the door to our large fenced in backyard unlatched so the dog and cats can come and go as they please. But in the winter, well, we just could not train them to close the door behind them. This alarm allows us to latch the door after they go out, and when they want in, we hear the alarm and open the door. The volume can be set for high or low depending on how far away we are from the alarm part, which we keep in the kitchen. We love this product!

Reviews.Title: can't use it
Reviews.Author: Alex T
Reviews.Content: good quality, reasonable price. Problem is I cannot control the sensitivity other than taping over areas on the sensor "eye", but even after doing that it still picks up passing cars that are on the street over 75' away.  The ringer only plays a "dong, dong, dong" every time it rings. I use this in an office to signal the door opening, and it would be nice to have one 'ding' or one short 'buzz' or some other less-annoying chime. I will stop using this for the above problems, and look for something else with some options.

Reviews.Title: Unacceptable
Reviews.Author: Disapointed
Reviews.Content: My problem with this product is that it has delayed reaction. The target has to do at least 25-30 sec. Kabuki dancing in front of it for sensor to kick in. It might be good for a cable guy writing you a love letter, as one of the reviewers below describes, but even a jogger will be able to run circles around your house without ever being spotted, leave alone a car illegally parked on your driveway. Returned it for free with no problems (thank you, Amazon!) and bought more expensive Skylink HA-434TL Long Range Motion Kit - works like a song!

Reviews.Title: Placement is key.
Reviews.Author: N. Broadhurst "Book reader"
Reviews.Content: I read some of the other reviews but placement is key. Mine is on the back of my mailbox faces the driveway. I dont live on a very busy street so the occasion dog walker passes by but I get very few false alarms. Wish it didn't have that bright light on it though, kinda makes it a target. The red light is annoying

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Nutter
Reviews.Content: I use it in my shop to let me know when people come in.  The little red lights never worked. I've only tested it up to ~120ft, the signal travels through several lath and plaster walls and a thick brick wall, allowing me to work outback while minding the shop.  It serves my needs well.

Reviews.Title: Replaced Grams early warning system
Reviews.Author: T. Brian
Reviews.Content: Grand mom had one of these that got broken, she missed it as it was hanging inside of doorway and let her know any time one of the kids or friends stopped in before they got inside of the house. Got another and she is happy- happy with it.5 minuet set and good to go, battery last a year + and the price is right.

Reviews.Title: 4 stars
Reviews.Author: Darlene Hilpipre
Reviews.Content: This sometimes it doesn't go off....once in about every fifty nine to seventy five times...otherwise perfect for what we needed!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Keep alerted
Reviews.Author: Sandhills Complete Security
Reviews.Content: this product works well enough but the range advertised is greatly overestimated. if it had the range advertised it would be even better but it does work for the purposes I need to alert me to somebody coming up the driveway

Reviews.Title: Very inexpensive alert for visitor or intruders
Reviews.Author: Larry E. Miller
Reviews.Content: My front door and walk way is not viewable from inside the house.  Frequently visitors and delivery persons come to the door but do not ring the door bell... which is hard to hear when upstairs.  With the wireless receiver located upstairs I know when someone approaches the front door every time.I would suggest carefully placing the motion detector to eliminate or minimize false alarms.  If it is able to detect too much movement from fringe areas the beeping will drive you crazy in a short time.  But because you just need a ccdof screws to hang the detector and receiver and ideal spot should be easy to find.3 C batteries are needed for the receiver and a 9V for the detector.  Unless you have constant traffic they should last for months before needing to be replaced.  This is based on using the Driveway Patrol in a previous residence.Just the peace of mind that I won't miss a delivery or visitor because I get automatic notification is well worth the money to buy this kit.

Reviews.Title: it works just not well
Reviews.Author: GREGORY ALAN DUNBAR
Reviews.Content: good news: it works.bad news: it works too much.anything at all will trip it and make it go off.  If a bug flies in front of it, it's going off.  If it's windy outside, it will see the trees moving and it will go off. If it's raining, that will make it go off. Snowing, that will make it go off.Literally,  one slightly breezy day it was going off every 5 seconds until I turned it off.So, I don't use them anymore.Though they might be useful indoors maybe in the garage or something where there's no movement, to let me know if there's an intruder or something.

Reviews.Title: Driveway sensor
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: The sensor does not always work when cars drive by.  It does seem to catch dogs and wild animals...this I don't understand.  I watch the sensor as I drive by and rarely does the light go on.  Looking for a replacement.

Reviews.Title: drive way
Reviews.Author: Rebecca   kashef
Reviews.Content: the alert does not match other alerts that you already have. One has to have "two systems " to cover the qarea needed.

Reviews.Title: poor signal
Reviews.Author: darold werkmeister
Reviews.Content: this alarm system does not preform very. in other wards very poor. its less than one hundred feet.  the sigal is very poor.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol Sensor and Receiver Kit
Reviews.Author: Crash
Reviews.Content: Item delivered on time, well packaged as advertized. I placed this item inside my garage on the wall with the sensor beam parallel to the two garage doors and at the regular entry door to the garage and placed the receiver at the far end of the house with three walls in between.  It works very well.  I am alerted when a car enters the garage or if someone enters the regular door.  I am very happy with this inexpensive product.

Reviews.Title: Not reliable
Reviews.Author: jerminator
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your time on this. Some days, it doesn't go off when a vehicle drives by it. Some days it does, but also goes off randomly.

Reviews.Title: Works as described, but...
Reviews.Author: Diana Bosworth "Diana"
Reviews.Content: This unit works as described and is sensitive, but - after only 2 weeks the quieter of the two alarm volumes stopped working. The quieter setting is very loud, but the louder level that is the only one that works now is downright jarring. We found the volume of the alarm so obtrusive that we have stopped using the unit.

Reviews.Title: Did'nt work
Reviews.Author: Mark Taylor
Reviews.Content: Ordered 3 to help warn of feral hogs in yard at night.  Two of the three did not work.  Poor quality control.

Reviews.Title: Great to have
Reviews.Author: Lisa Bendig
Reviews.Content: Omg I don't know where to start first.. I had originally purchased this because I was home alone quite a bit and it worked great it also was great because I always knew when my mother or father in law were driving up. So yes it works great

Reviews.Title: Not worth the effort or money
Reviews.Author: Douglas Wolford
Reviews.Content: Even though it is quite inexpensive....it doesn't work or rather it works too well...lots of false senses, and, even though I followed the directions to put tape over the sensor, it will not work properly.

Reviews.Title: Manufacturer Quality Problem
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these about 6 years ago and it worked just great. A month ago I purchased a second one, and it arrived defective. It keep going off every 3 to 8 seconds. I returned it to Amazon and ordered another unit. It also arrived with the same defective symptoms. With 2 units behaving the same way, it appears that the manufacturer no longer tests the units before they are shipped. I am glad that Amazon takes these units back with no hassles.

Reviews.Title: cheaply made
Reviews.Author: jham
Reviews.Content: looks and feels cheaply made. It doesn't really work with the batteries. I bought an AC adaptor for it which made it work for two months. Now, it won't stop beeping. I'm gonna try a different product.

Reviews.Title: Worked for one month to the day!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Parker
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased at first with this product... Then it stopped working. I changed the battery thinking it was very soon for it to need changing, but had no other options. Changing the battery did nothing. I was very dissappointed also to find that I could not return it because my time of one month had lapsed that day!I guess you get what you pay for,nso I will look for an option that had more life. Even though it was only $17, I hate to lose that money in this economy!

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted......
Reviews.Author: ROBERT E. HEAVNER
Reviews.Content: They are the 2nd & 3rd ones I've had.......they work great.I had to put duct tape on both sides of the glass and leaveabout 3/4" in the middle to cut down on unwanted alarms...Batteries last a long time in both pieces. A great deal forthe price........

Reviews.Title: not much
Reviews.Author: Ruth Purvis "Lovenest"
Reviews.Content: I have purchased two of these and had to return both, the first gave false signals, returned it, got a replacement, the replacement would not do nothing, it never picked up anything. I returned it to amazon ask for a refund, I have about 26.45 in these things this includes return postage tha i have to pay, and still have nothing. I don't seem to have any luck on getting a refund either. I would not but any item from this company ever. I will rate the product and the company at a -0

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Wayne Brubaker
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at a device this inexpensive would work so well. I placed it on a window shelf on the outside of my house and it picks up even cats walking on the driveway.

Reviews.Title: Does NOT Work.  Piece of trash.
Reviews.Author: S. Hansen
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these two years ago, before Halloween, to detect kids on my porch.  That one sort of worked, if there was more than one or two kids.  After Halloween, I took the batteries out and put it away.  The next year, with new batteries, it did not work.So, this year, I bought a new one, also to detect Ghosts and Witches on my porch.  The new one only works if the transmitter is within a few feet of the receiver, and the transmitter is vertical, and you wave something HOT in front of it.  But, from twenty feet away, with the transmitter fastened to the overhang above the porch (in a horizontal position, looking down), it does NOT work at all.It's not worth my time to return.  So, I will just pitch it with the other Halloween trash.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price but not very reliable
Reviews.Author: Satish Soni "SSoni"
Reviews.Content: This is the cheapest product you can get for the function it provides. But it does not have a very good range of detection. It works only if you come in front of it or cross it.

Reviews.Title: Bad deal!
Reviews.Author: Sparky
Reviews.Content: Product arrived quickly.  After putting in new batteries, the alarm only worked when I was directly within 4-5 feet of it.  There was no perephial sensing.  By the next day it wasn't working at all.  Yet, the third night, it went off for no reason in the middle of the night.  That was it.  Product was returned to Amazon.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: crap by any other name...
Reviews.Author: J. Ferguson
Reviews.Content: First set it up, it seems to work just fine.  As soon as the air temp falls below 60 the unit ceases to function.
