Reviews.Content: This is a PIECE OF GARBAGE. Pure consumer RIP OFF. It does NOT work the way it's supposed to work. DO NOT BUY IT. I purchased plenty of stuff from Amazon and this is the ONLY product that I HATE. WASTE OF MONEY.

Reviews.Title: Stay away!
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: In actuality it's just 2 paperweights... Bought brand new batteries and would never turn on. Returned this promptly. Complete garbage.

Reviews.Title: Awful product
Reviews.Author: SIR McMILLON
Reviews.Content: didn't work at all. I highly do not recommend this product its awful and does not work. It should be discontinued

Reviews.Title: Read the reviews about this cheaply made toy. Don't waste your time or money
Reviews.Author: Ernest Bentley
Reviews.Content: I bought mine in Nov., 2012 and have toyed with it for 12 months. Currently the sensor is lying face down on my sofa and detecting motion every few seconds (I'm across the room and out of sight). Same hing when I laced it in an unlighted closet.Shielding the lens with tape has no effect. I've tried different locations, angles, elevation......nothing lessens the sensitivity of he sensor.How much do you earn per hour? Is your time less valuable than this cheap toy?A specialist in radio signals tells me that there is a huge tolerance in electrical components for gadgets such as these. On the average, some may work fine, but most will be too sensitive or too insensitive due to manufacturing variability.So save your time and money, pay more for a higher quality device - you will save money in the end.

Reviews.Title: Zip
Reviews.Author: dora pupuhi
Reviews.Content: Not a Beep.. even after trying several brand new batteries. I can say that, Service was real quick and fast. I wanted the product to be sent back after fixing it. But, I guess not. I don't know if I had a refund back into my credit card. Need to check that out. My old same kind Driveway Sensor, still works though.

Reviews.Title: DRIVEWAY PATROLSENSOR AND RECEIVER
Reviews.Author: Ron Melyan
Reviews.Content: very dissaponted with the product. did not pick up signals as reviews,and the alarm sensor was not very loud. I had it one week and returned it.Just did not do what the many reviews said it did.

Reviews.Title: Item did not work
Reviews.Author: charles small
Reviews.Content: I installed the batteries, followed the instructions and the item did not work.  It was very cheap and I threw it away.

Reviews.Title: Great skunk and raccoon alert tool
Reviews.Author: Terry Manning
Reviews.Content: We HAD a problem with skunks and raccoons digging-up our gardens and lawn....Placed a few of these around the yard and the problem prowlers tripped the beam at night.  A few well placed shots from the 22 rifle....No more problem!!!

Reviews.Title: Died.
Reviews.Author: Tcat "Loves Amazon Over Wally World"
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased for about 19 days.About 4:30 AM the sender went into 'alert' every 4 seconds. Wrote to BigFly Sports via Amazon. I wondered why I did not hear back. Checking at Amazon, they did not give this site an accurate email address so my query bounced back. I didn't realize this til the 30 day return period had passed.Out $25 for nothing.Avoid this product and Stay Away from Big Fly Sports.

Reviews.Title: Sucks nuts
Reviews.Author: Pimpdaddy12444
Reviews.Content: It works just about half the time, but the other half any object can pass through it without it alarming. Very unreliable....also sucks nuts

Reviews.Title: Ehh.
Reviews.Author: jidleman
Reviews.Content: I've had some things go missing form my car port, so i bought this to try and catch the guy(s). Setup was easy. But it seems it can be defeated by walking fast by it. If I walk slow enough, it will sound the alarm. If I walk my normal pace it misses me every time. i would think a thief would be scuttling in the carport pretty fast to avoid being seen by a neighbor. So I don't think it will work for my proposes. Maybe a car is big enough that it won't have any trouble. I gave it 3 stars, the receiver should come with an a/c adapter since it has the spot for one. Try and find a 4.5 volt adapter with a barrel plug on it big enough. I'm stuck paying $8 for C cell batteries when they run down.

Reviews.Title: Great pet litter alert!
Reviews.Author: HappyHavanese
Reviews.Content: OK, so I didn't use this in my driveway. I trained my dogs to use a litter pan. Yes, litter trained dogs. I set the sensor up on the ground in front of the litter pan which is located far away from the general living area to signal when my dogs use the litter. This way, I don't have to keep checking the litter to clean up the smellies, and the smellies won't linger in the litter smelling up the house.Works like a charm! Every time.

Reviews.Title: O.K. But not for me.
Reviews.Author: Pragmatist
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive and fast delivery.I shut it off after being awakened the 1st night by 4 false alarms! I installed it as per instructions but it picks up every thing. I live in a wooded area with lots of wildlife, it appears that squirrels, birds and the like set it off as well as nocturnal prowlers like raccoons and deer. Might set it up inside the house and turn it on only at night. Guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: the siren box did not work, motion box did work
Reviews.Author: Fleet Admiral "The Majestic Seas"
Reviews.Content: only half of this device worked, have one already from another comp..it work fine...but this one from this seller, only the motion box worked

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: countrymamabliss
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product and it arrived promptly.....however, I was bummed that the thing did not work.  I took it down to Radio Shack to get a DC power adapter.  The employee tested one out that he thought fit and it did not work.  He said, "This thing works right?  I told him I did not know, I just got it and never had a battery in it.  He loaded three C batteries and it still did not work.  It was a defective unit.  Contacting Amazon to return this....

Reviews.Title: Don't use it if you live in the country.
Reviews.Author: m callard-stone
Reviews.Content: I live in a moderately-sized suburban/rural area.  We are not known for our high crime, but we do have our fair share of drug busts and indigents (i.e. homeless people of questionable moral fiber).  I live on an acre, not far from Main Street.  My street does not have street lights or a neighborhood watch program...in short, it is a slightly spooky place to live alone as a middle-aged female (ugh, I hate using that term!).  I bought this device because I suspected that people were coming into my yard at night, as evidenced by hypodermic syringes underneath the oleander in the front of my yard(!).  I installed the Driveway Patrol at my gates, as shown in the tv commercial.  Within 15 minutes of installation,it was ringing regularly to announce the transit of neighboring cats across my property.  Since I do not suspect the cats of having left the hypodermic needles in my yard, this was of little use to me.I readjusted the directionality of the devices, but it still was sensitive enough to pick up pedestrians who were passing by, as well as alerting me to dogs and perhaps birds -- in short, it was going off with "false" alarms regularly.  Because there were no other vertical objects along my driveway to hang the devices (and since I really wanted to know if people were coming in through the gates) I was forced to abandon their use.  Additionally, the batteries ran down quickly, most likely due to the continual drain on them caused by transmitting the constant signal to the base unit, which was about 100 feet away inside my house. In short, this device will educate you about the amount of incidental foot traffic through the area of interest, as well as possibly alerting you to serious intruders -- but by the time you get a serious intruder, you are likely to be ignoring it because it cries "wolf" so much.  Not tremendously useful.

Reviews.Title: Works great for us
Reviews.Author: William Hoke
Reviews.Content: We set this up on a fence running alongside our driveway, which runs alongside our house. As some have noted, tree branches blowing in the wind will set it off - but hey, that's motion. As the maker recommends, I put tape over that side of the sensor, and all is fine now. It still picks up the car and the kids going by - exactly what I want.

Reviews.Title: Motion sensor will not detect movement
Reviews.Author: RC0784
Reviews.Content: Installed the unit under a step on front deck. It will not pick up any motion. I put tape around the "eye" to narrow the field. Nothing is working. It will set off the alarm when I physically move the sensor. I can not get any tech support or answers to correct this issue. I wasted my money on this item.

Reviews.Title: High "False Signals"
Reviews.Author: William R. Heyde
Reviews.Content: The unit did nothing but give false alarms every 10 seconds.Troubleshooting with the manual suggest applying tape to narrow the beam.The receiver also may experience false signals due to "wireless routers"...etc.The sending unit may give false signals in direct sunlight.I ended up taking the unit apart (since it was money lost anyway) to see the inside.No way to adjust the sensitivity of the unit was noted.Save your money and avoid this product unless you want to install it for the blinking red L.E.D. for people to see.

Reviews.Title: didn't work
Reviews.Author: Dina
Reviews.Content: had one of a different brand had for 4yr work great thought i would try this one because it was cheaper, didn't work would not recommend at all, i returned mine. no problems with return.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Junk Scam
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Fortunately I ordered a few different types of these because I knew they would be very low quality and most likely not work.  Well, I was exactly right with this one.  I made it as far as opening the package and going to put in the batteries when I realized there was half the metal battery connection plate things missing on one side, so the batteries would not be making a circuit.  I happen to be an electrical engineer but you don't need to be to realize that batteries in a plastic bin with no conductors connecting to each other isn't going to do anything...  If the quality control on this product is so bad that they could let that happen, I don't even want to imagine how bad this product actually sucks when it is actually "working".

Reviews.Title: False Alarm
Reviews.Author: forestdweller
Reviews.Content: After reading all the other reviews I felt confident purchasing this item. After placing it on a post at the end of our drive I quickly found out it was too far from the receiver. I moved it about 60 ft closer on a tree at the bend of the drive. Still it wouldn't pick up anything, finally I moved the receiver into the front bedroom in the window sill. That put the two components about 50 ft apart. Then it picked up almost everything including the wind but several times it didn't "see" cars that came into the driveway. My husband travels for business and is gone a lot, we live way out in the woods and our house faces the lake with the back facing the road, we have no neighbors and I thought this would be great to warn me when the rare visitor comes to call. You get what you pay for and even less with this thing.

Reviews.Title: garbage!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: TomC
Reviews.Content: Save your money. This thing goes off constantly, even when nothing passes by it! I bought this to alert us if anybody enters near our garage at night. Turns out I was already ripped off when I bought this product.....typical Chinese crap!

Reviews.Title: Works great to let me know when someone is driving up the driveway
Reviews.Author: Paul Bradford
Reviews.Content: My daughter is picked up by school van every morning.  This sensor works perfectly in telling us when the van is here.  When not expecting anyone, we will normally shut off the receiver because it picks up false alarms.  The slightest movement can set it off.  So in essence it does what it's asked to do.

Reviews.Title: Cool, but doesn't work consistently
Reviews.Author: PastorJ
Reviews.Content: We love it when it works, but it doesn't always work. Also, the box says it can reach up to 400 feet.  We had to place the two units about 150 feet apart to get it to work.  I will not buy this brand again, but I will look for this concept as it's helpful for living down a long driveway.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol
Reviews.Author: Solar Guy
Reviews.Content: Good for the price.Must put in protective can or box. I have mine in a plastic outdoor faucet cover.Wind will set it off all the time if you don't protect it. If weather is really bad you will have to turn it off sometimes because of false alarms.  For the price- I would recommend one.Mine works @ 200ft fine. Great gift idea.

Reviews.Title: Weather resistant my butt
Reviews.Author: Shastin
Reviews.Content: Bought this product, for the most part I loved it, it did exactly what I wanted it to do. However, this thing just weathered it's first rainy day and it broke...... Will be buying another non the less, it does not work as advertised. I live in San Diego, so weather is usually a non issue anyways but it failed it's first rainy day.

Reviews.Title: waste off money - goes off when the wind blows
Reviews.Author: Terri Morris
Reviews.Content: This alarm is so sensitive it was going off when the wind blows. I would run to the window and nothing would be there. It got so annoying in the middle of the night, I turned it off. I tried putting tape over the sides of the sensor and putting it inside a mailbox but it still went off all the time. It is cheap but if you cant use it it is a waste of money. I would rec finding a better one.

Reviews.Title: USELESS to the nth degree. . .
Reviews.Author: Tana Mitchell
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item, installed it per instructions and began testing.  The chime unit was originally approximately 8' from the sensor unit and would NOT sound an alarm.  I kept moving the chime unit closer to the sensor unit in order to find a suitable place to hang the chime unit permanently.  Finaly, at approximately 12", the chime unit was able to pick up the signal from the sensor unit.  A complete waste of time and money.  Too bad I had to give it even ONE star.

Reviews.Title: False alarms require location changes until its just right - READ ON...
Reviews.Author: A. Acierno "Zorro"
Reviews.Content: Updated review - January 22, 2012.Ive had this item for a year now and there are some things you need to know.First, it is very sensative. The swaying palm fronds would set it off. A lizard walking on it set it off.  A shadow line (from a tree or corner wall) that passes by the sensor set it off. That said, this can be a good thing. You just need to position it in a location that will be away from these things. All I needed to do is move it about a foot lower and it worked great. You have to find that "sweet spot". You cannot turn down the sensitivity.I highly recommend using a 9 volt LITHIUM battery which lasts 3 months, instead of a regular 9 volt battery which lasts 4 weeks. The C batteries in the receiver last about 4 months.  I HAD false alarms until I moved it in an area that avoid the above obstacles. If you can do that, you are good to buy this.  For the price, it works great.I have done a lot of research for sensors like this - from laser beam to motion. Laser beams really require hard wiring and costs about $100 (not including installation if you cant do it yourself). Honestly, after using it for a year, I WOULD buy it again.I would change my star rating to 4 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproff
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I had one it worked for a few months. It was very loud ended up placing the receiver outside on the porch. It was so loud we could hear it inside. It finaly went out after watter got in it. opened it up and discovered that even tho it has a seal the back where the screw mounting hole is not sealed.  Worked for a few more months after drying it out and then quit.  Do not place anywhere where it can rain on it. Suggest under a eve or inside some type of box. Its not rated for outdoor use.

Reviews.Title: DOA and no response from seller
Reviews.Author: Picard321 "Picard321"
Reviews.Content: Bought one last year.  Was DOA out of the box.  Seller never responded.  Threw it away.  Got a dog from the PetSmart shelter to yap whenever someone drives up...provides companionship also for same money.

Reviews.Title: Works sporadically and has no range
Reviews.Author: A. Weed
Reviews.Content: I read the description and thought this would be perfect for our needs. After setting it up, it didn't sound off for any movement.  After several tries it worked twice, but then stopped again.  I was only a few feet away.  I tried at further distances and it still only worked in 2% of the tests.  Tried different locations, with clear line of vision and also without, but it still failed to work properly.  I kept trying for a few days and no good.  It is pretty rare I receive an item that is this bad, but it happened with this thing.  This product is not even worth $0 (free).  I would rather pay $100 on something that works.

Reviews.Title: piece of junk!
Reviews.Author: Di
Reviews.Content: Got it,  opened it, put batteries, in set it up, than I turned it on inside and all it did was make noise! Wouldn't shut off!My husband put different batteries in and moved it still doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Constant beeping; can't even use it.
Reviews.Author: PatF "PatinMaryland"
Reviews.Content: I just received the Driveway Patrol and inserted the batteries.  The alarm in the receiver goes off constantly and won't stop until I shut it off so there's no way I can even test it to see if I can use it.  I even tried putting the box over the top of the driveway unit and the receiver still beeps continuously.  It will stop for a few seconds, then continues beeping.  Very disappointed.  Sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: I purchased this with the hopes of knowing when someone drove in my driveway. Now I know every time the wind blows because tree limbs blowing in the wind set it off. I never realized how windy it is outside. I found the magnetic driveway alarms are the way to go. Save your money and buy a good magnetic alarm. Do your research before wasting your money.

Reviews.Title: Affordable & good
Reviews.Author: Sonny R.
Reviews.Content: Mine lasted for almost five years but that's pretty good considering how much usage I got out of it & the affordable price. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Driveway sensor review
Reviews.Author: RonK
Reviews.Content: The driveway sensor that we purchased is performing in an excellent fashion.  We are amazed at the range and reliability of these sensors.

Reviews.Title: It works for me
Reviews.Author: Endi "Endiablado"
Reviews.Content: I do not use it outsideI bought this taking a chance it would work as a door chime, and it doesit has yet to give false alarms and it works flawlessly when a person enters my storeso far so good

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: LJ'smom
Reviews.Content: This product performs as advertised.  It is a good alert system for any where you would like to know if traffic is coming or crossing a path.  I would recommend this sensor to anyone.  It was delivered on time without any problem.

Reviews.Title: Works for a couple of weeks only
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got the Driveway Patrol kit to use as an alert to let me know when my cats wanted to come inside. I set it up at the front door at cat height and after a few adjustments to narrow the range so that it only picked up the cats when they were right at the door, everything was great - but only for about 2 weeks. Then the alert went off and wouldn't stop. I tried other locations, I tried changing all the batteries, I tried adding tape to the sensor, I tried removing tape from the sensor, heck I'd have even tried reasoning with it if I thought it would do anything. Nothing helped, the alert just wouldn't stop sounding. In the end I gave up and returned it. I ended up getting Thomas & Betts RC4610 Battery Operated Wireless Motion Activated Chime at a local brick and mortar store instead and that's been fine.

Reviews.Title: Motion sensor is way, way overly sensitive
Reviews.Author: Howard Gofstein
Reviews.Content: I noticed in the instructions for this unit that it is possible to get false alarms and that it may take "trial and error" to defeat the oversensitivity of this product. The instructions say that you may have to place masking tape over the sensor window to minimize false alarms. Well, I got false alarms no matter where I put the motion sensor or how strategically I covered the sensor window with duct tape (the very notion that the manufacturer tells you to cover the motion sensor window should tell you something; how absolutely ridiculous). No matter what I did, no matter where I placed this unit, the minute I activated the separate alarm unit, it immediately sounded the loud, harsh chime. I wanted an item with a harsh chime, as I am a sleepwalker and I need something that will startle me awake before I walk out my condo door (which I recently did, after several months of not having any such incidents). But this item was useless, a waste of time and energy, as I had to run out and buy 3 "C" batteries for the alarm unit. It has a place to attach an electrical cord, but it does not come with an electrical cord. WHY?The only thing that is easy about this unit was printing up the necessary return authorization bar code and return address label. I repackaged the unit for refund the same day I received it. Good riddance.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol Sensor
Reviews.Author: ranger
Reviews.Content: Received Driveway Patrol Sensor Receiver in a timely manner. Sensor lights, won't go off. Checked against my neighbor's who suggested I get one.  The receiver is fine, sensor will not activate with his either.Thanks,Steve Hazel705 Lexington Park, Florissant Mo. 63031

Reviews.Title: Wanna know who's in your drive way?
Reviews.Author: Gar31
Reviews.Content: I bought this after we had a few cars broken into on my street and my lights outside vandlized ..I have cameras set up so I could see what they did the next day..But I could never cath them in the act....This thing really lets you know when someone is in your drive way.....Helped me catch them....Great product.

Reviews.Title: Night time security.
Reviews.Author: D. A. Brink
Reviews.Content: Does an outstanding job of letting me know when someone or something has entered my property at night.  Allows me to sleep better knowing that my property is being monitored at a substantially lower price than large home security firms.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Hirameagle
Reviews.Content: This little device would be GREAT if they worked, but I've had two and neither works correctly!  The first one ate the batteries...new Duracells in way less than a week.  I tried to buy a DC converter, but there are no specs given for the converter.....it's voltage is shown, but not how many amps and the Radio Shack person said if I picked one with too much amperage, it wold fry the board in the device.  Soooo, I sent that one back and got another one.  This one doesn't seem to deplete the batteries so fast, but it's completely unreliable.  I had the transmitter placed on a tree about 200 +/- feet from the receiver, inside a little bird house looking cover to protect it from rain and sun, etc.  It seemed to work at first, but within a day or less it would alarm sometime and not other times. I thought it was possibly too far from the house/receiver, so I moved it closer...maybe 150 feet from the receiver and not much change.  Then I moved the receiver upstairs and put it in the window looking right at the transmitter, but still doesn't work most of the time.  The garbage truck did set it off a few days ago and a few nights back it went off about 4:00AM.  Never saw anything....probably deer walked in front of it.Can't say the one you buy won't work, but I haven't had good luck at all and I wish they would work, because it's just what we need with a long, rural type driveway!!!

Reviews.Title: Good alarm for the money!
Reviews.Author: Donald Kraemer "Biking Signman"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an inexpensive way to alert me when someone comes up our driveway. This was the solution! It has been up for a month and worked well. Although it does tell me when a squirrel is on the tree, it does its job well. I would suggest mounting where squirrels don't play.

Reviews.Title: Do not waste you money.
Reviews.Author: Annie Music
Reviews.Content: Outdoor sensor only worked when cars were coming to the house, never leaving.  Indoor sensor quit working completely after only 1 week. Terrible product.

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: J. Elson
Reviews.Content: I purchased unit about a month ago and with some experimentation (tape over motion sensor) it works great with only an occasional squirrel setting it off.  I painted it with rough type dark green paint and placed it in a hole in a tree about 3 ft from the ground so it is barely seen.  Sound is great being pretty loud allowing us to hear it in our basement family room and upstairs. Additionally the dog barks too when she hears it. The unit is about 90 feet away from the house - haven't tried it at a greater distance.  Don't know about battery life yet but the receiver has a jack for external power adapter. No close neighbors so no interference problem for us. UPDATE: It is two years later: The unit above quit functioning after falling out of the tree and I drove over it. Ordered another one and after a few months it experienced the problem others have experienced - would't quit sending signal to the receiver.  Since it was out of warranty I bought a third unit and it has worked now for about a year. I now have 3 receivers that all work with the current transmitter so I can have one on each level of the house. After viewing the construction from the crushed unit I know the sensor is only located in a small area at the top of the "window" on the transmitter.  To reduce sensitivity I have taped over almost all the area except about a 1/2 inch square area at the top.  I have an 120v 4.5 volt adapter but I can't get it to work on any of the receivers. Voltmeter shows that adapter is OK so I'm not sure where the problem is located.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Alert system
Reviews.Author: Net Master "NetMaster"
Reviews.Content: Finally an Affordable system to alert you of visitors.Wireless and battery operated design allows easy deployment.Care to note the limited range and try to keep the units close to line of sight.

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: Tyler Smalley
Reviews.Content: What a surprise! It's made in China! This has no sensitivity adjustment and it becomes totally unreliable. Ours kept going off when the sun would come out from behind the clouds so we added masking tape as instructed until their was only a tiny opening remaining down the center. Because we can't depend on it I am now returning to amazon to shop for a decent model.

Reviews.Title: Worthless waste of time and money
Reviews.Author: Leah Storm "Leah Storm"
Reviews.Content: This unit worked when tested inside my living room, but put outside, about 60 feet away from receiver, responded about 1 out of 5 times, for two days, then quit. I went through several new batteries on both units, and put the receiver in the direct line of sight of the sensor, and nothing.... silence.Junk. Battery-sucking, time-wasting junk.

Reviews.Title: So-So
Reviews.Author: Gunworks
Reviews.Content: Have been using this for about one month. Overall I would suggest you consider buying one of better quality and saving this money.Does not work well in cold or rainy weather - overall is not reliable - will at times pick-up a dog walking past but does nothing when the UPS truck pulls in!! Will pick-up a white car but nothing dark in color.

Reviews.Title: An absolute waste of money.  I threw mine away
Reviews.Author: George Sabga Jr.
Reviews.Content: I purchased these to be alerted when someone drives into my driveway.  The problem with this system is that it has an obscene amount of false alarms.  This thing goes off if a car passes down the street, a bird lands in my yard, a leaf falls from a tree, the wind blows too hard.  It is totally useless.  I even tried to tape the sides of the sensor to narrow the focus as suggested in other reviews but it did not help at all.  If you are looking to waste your money, look no further.  There must be better solutions out there because this is nothing short of total garbage.

Reviews.Title: Not just for driveways!
Reviews.Author: Timothy E. Davis
Reviews.Content: This thing works great, it is simple to install & adjust. I have used this as a driveway monitor, a front & back porch monitor,placed it by my swimming pool, & even inside my vehicle to catch some neighborhood bandits ! For the money you cant beat it.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Needed
Reviews.Author: Martin C. Davies
Reviews.Content: Wanted an alert when my dogs wanted to come into the house from outside. Mounted the sensor in the exterior room entrance the chime box is portable, so rather than keep a look out for them the chimes alert me.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Albert Jackson "Engineer"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit to be used for a general purpose room-entry alarm system.  The sensing unit has a round shaped bottom.  It will not sit on a flat surface very well...it rocks around.  I do not understand why it does not have a flat bottom, in case, someone wants to place on a flat surface.  If you mount it on a wall, no problem.  Otherwise, it works as advertised.  Also, the battery type (C size) used in the receiving uint are not as cost-effective D size.  D size batteries cost the same as C size, but, last twice as long.  Yes, the D size is larger, but, still a better choice.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk.
Reviews.Author: Baden Thull
Reviews.Content: Worked unreliably, in living room, at distance of 25'. Set the sensor outside? Fuggitaboutdit!Rubbish.

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: Mary Brown "Girl Interrupted"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas 2009 for him to hear when paper man shows up. Worked for one week. Sucks!

Reviews.Title: Hear who's comeing through the door
Reviews.Author: Bruce Yates
Reviews.Content: This product is good for a door chime.We use it in our store, it works great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome hunting tool
Reviews.Author: Brian J. Garrett
Reviews.Content: I use this for night hunting feral hogs and it works like a hamp, I stay warm and cozy and wait for the chime, then it is lights out for Mr. Pig.[...]

Reviews.Title: This worked great for a week or two
Reviews.Author: a reader
Reviews.Content: When I set this up it worked like a charm and I was very pleased with my purchase.  When it stopped working, as recommended by some reviewers, I placed it inside a cozy birdhouse where it would be protected from the rain and wind.  It worked a few times after that but then stopped working again altogether.  It was great while it lasted and it is indeed a bargain for those people for whom it functions as intended, but not for me.

Reviews.Title: driveway alarm
Reviews.Author: D. Glover "big  d"
Reviews.Content: product  works  as  stated ...have  bought  4...in  all,,,  i  use  them  as  an  indoor  alarm  system......the  receiver  will  receive  signals  from  all  4  ...i  just  don't  know  which  station  is  sending a signal...  at  additional cost u  can  get  a  dc  adapter  4.7  volt  as  is..  the  units  work  on  one 9volt  and  3  c  type  batteries......  GREAT  BUY.... shipping  is  slowwww

Reviews.Title: Unreliable
Reviews.Author: Roberly R. Hirschlor
Reviews.Content: I cannot count on this to work.  Sometimes it does and sometimes it doesn't.  This has been a mistake and waste of money.  In other words it is not reliable.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Dave Burson
Reviews.Content: It says 400 feet. It might work 40 feet away if you are not going through any walls. Do not waist your money on this item.

Reviews.Title: PIECE OF JUNK - Does not work as advertised
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Played with it, and it was totally unreliable and/or unpredictable.Should not be allowed to be sold. It is a [...] and a rip-off, period.

Reviews.Title: WARNING:IT'S THAT GOOD!
Reviews.Author: Tonya "tweetycraze"
Reviews.Content: I only ordered one of these,but I just ordered 3 more! It's that good. Warning:It's sensative. No false alarms. Nice loud alarm. It won't stop until the movement stops. If that alarm goes off something is moving around.  Excellent for outside. The reciever and sensor do not have to be on top of each other to work either.  Unfortunately I wasted my money on the "Household Alert". Don't buy it! See my review on it.

Reviews.Title: Detects everything, sometimes even cars
Reviews.Author: Chris Gregor
Reviews.Content: This product annoyed the hell out of me. Birds, wind, clouds?, heat? rabbits, deer, insects Cars in the street even set it off It's not really meant to detect just cars, higher priced item that detects heavy objects is what is needed if you are using for driveway monitor - this device did not make it for me.

Reviews.Title: Excessive noise
Reviews.Author: T. Sutrick
Reviews.Content: This is a good idea but it lacks a sensitivity adjustment.  No matter where I set it it gives false alerts. It seems there was not much thought in making the product.

Reviews.Title: Does its job very well
Reviews.Author: Daniel O. Jensen
Reviews.Content: We use this to help train our dog going into her dog run to do her business.  She gets a treat when she does.  She has to go through two doggy doors to get into her run, so sometimes she tries a shortcut and pees in the garage.  Now, she can't fool us and is learning that treats come only when she makes it outside into her run.The unit rings a chime when triggered. No problem on range - about 70 feet through many walls and a cabinet. Works great. The sensor is outside in the rain and still no problem.

Reviews.Title: Great Item!
Reviews.Author: Millzerz
Reviews.Content: We bought this product to catch doorbell ditchers that have plauged us for 14 months!  Works like a charm!  It's easy to set up and use and gives fair warning to give you the advantage of knowing who's approaching your door.  We searched all over for similar products that didn't receive good reviews and cost alot more money.  This product earned its great reviews by doing what promised.  Great item!  We would buy this item again!!!!

Reviews.Title: Perplexed
Reviews.Author: David Pooler "DPooler"
Reviews.Content: As you know, I ordered 2 of the same. One worked and one didn't. Iinformed the shipper. They told me that they would send (e-mail) areturn label, which won't print out for me. I sent them a replyinforming them of this fact and have had no further instructions orcorrespondence from them.

Reviews.Title: Shipping Charges Unreasonable
Reviews.Author: Virginia Hokie "Hatteras"
Reviews.Content: Although this item has a good price for it, the vendor has shipping charges that total almost as much as the product itself. I was going to order multiple units, 4 to be exact, but the shipping was being calculated for each per unit, although they were probably going to ship them together. Add up your shipping before purchasing here folks.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money, buy The Reporter instead
Reviews.Author: Eileen LEH NJ
Reviews.Content: I bought this a few years ago.  At times it worked, but mostly it gave  false alarms constantly.  I bought the Reporter more than a year ago, and it alarms 99.9% of the time, and I have not had any false alarms. Don't waste your money on this thingCheck it out:Chamberlain Wireless Alert System #RWA-300R

Reviews.Title: Too many false alarms...
Reviews.Author: R. KUMAR "RKWindsor"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product couple of months ago, and I have tried using it many times. Other than false alarms the unit pretty much work as expected. However, it gives too many false alarms, to become useless. The motion detector is too sensitive and there is no way of controlling it. It comes factory prefixed settings.Here are my observations on false alarm conditions:- Tree leaves moving causes the alarm to go off.- During fall, dry leaves moving cause the alarm to go off- If there is sudden changes in sunlight on a cloudy day, the alarm goes offI also have motion detector security light installed, which works perfectly. The light goes on only when there is someone (or fairly large object) moving. Hardly any false trigger on it.That makes me think this driveway patrol has been designed poorly and does not serve the purpose.My whole family got annoyed with this, as it definitely does not work as expected. So everyone in my house switches it off after couple of hours I switch it on.It would have been great product without this flaw as cost is reasonably low, and everything else is works just fine.I would not recommend to anyone to purchase. It might be possible that the unit I got is defective.It is useless product ..... DO NOT BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: NormL W
Reviews.Content: I was absolutely amazed at the sensitive of the Driveway Patrol Kit.  It really works!!  Even a cat crossing my front walk does not go undetected.  I had to move a potted tree because the shadow of the tree swaying in the wind cast a shadow on the wall, and the sensor picked up the movement.  Amazing!  Great bargain for the price;  it sells as much as triple the price elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Alarm
Reviews.Author: Doug Farnsworth
Reviews.Content: Driveway Patrol Sensor and Receiver KitGreat turnaround on order and product works great.

Reviews.Title: Someone's here!
Reviews.Author: Josh Assing
Reviews.Content: I work from home, and my office has no windows.  so when someone comes over; unless they knock right at the office wall; I miss them.This has worked great for 3 days; with only false alarms for deer wandering thru the driveway.I can't believe this cheap (hmm, sorry, inexpensive) device works this well.  Battery life has yet to be determined; but the performance of it is nice.

Reviews.Title: not for the out side area
Reviews.Author: M. alfar "hope"
Reviews.Content: this product is ok i guess . it works fine but i thought i am getting some thing for my driveway . but this product dose not work in the rain . i think it's only for the inside .. mine worked for only a week after it rain it stoped and didn't work . so if you getting it for the out side thing don't get this product my friend

Reviews.Title: Drive way sensor used for mailbos
Reviews.Author: Cleve Francoeur
Reviews.Content: Bought for a friend, Have one my self, use it in my mail box to let me know when the mail has arrived, Works great. CJF

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: lorilei
Reviews.Content: This item works well, but it is very loud even the switch is on low.  It will wake you up in the middle of the night, no doubt.I hung it on the mailbox post about waist high, so I did not get all the cats in the neighborhood setting it off.  It even picks up the cars driving down the road.Good product, but the sound could be quite a bit softer.

Reviews.Title: driveway alarm
Reviews.Author: D. Deen
Reviews.Content: Works great in cold weather,some false alarms in warmer weather with direct sunlight and shadows.I am going to put it into a birdhouse,hopefully this will solve the problem.

Reviews.Title: EVERYONE in America should have one of these!
Reviews.Author: David Gifford
Reviews.Content: We live in a fairly large home - when I am upstairs in my computer room or in the master bathroom and someone rings the doorbell - I CANNOT hear it!! (esp. while playing a computer game or with the TV on) I received this unit from Amazon, put 3 C Batteries in the receiver (you can use an AC Adapter) and 1 9 Volt in the unit that goes outside. I installed it facing my driveway. As we live in a quite neighborhood I heard nothing for a while... then I noticed that every time a car drove past our house, it went off... I simply moved it so that i "looked" at the driveway perpendicularly and it works PERFECTLY! 2 sound adjustments on the receiver are PERFECT - not an annoying sound and perfect volume! Thank you TELEbrands for a GREAT product at a giveaway price!

Reviews.Title: Typical Made in China durability
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Driveway Patrol and it worked well enough, although it would never alarm for my daughters VW Beetle for some reason? Anyway, it worked for exactly one year - now I have a non-functioning unreliable "made in China" product that I'll probably just throw away. Buyer Beware!

Reviews.Title: save your cash
Reviews.Author: Walter Dagostino "wd"
Reviews.Content: Hello  I bought this item thinking it would be great just to monitor my driveway. I installed it and after some tweaking I had it working great. No false alarms, had a car pull into my driveway and it went off well. Next day, it went off when my paper boy dropped off the paper. Great. Then, about 9 this morning it started going off for no apparent reason, and kept going off,didn't stop. I unplugged the batteries and reinstalled them thinking it would somehow reset but no luck. Just threw it in the garbage. Not worth returning because it was only 10 bucks and the shipping alone wouldn't make it worth it. Basically you get what you pay for. KEEP YOUR 10 DOLLARS AND DO NOT BUY THIS> IF I SAVE ONE PERSON FROM BUYING THIS, I"D BE GLAD I WROTE THIS REVIEW>

Reviews.Title: Cheap price = cheap product
Reviews.Author: J. Seaton
Reviews.Content: It works great if you're outside near the sensor, but it doesn't do so well when it's inside. 100ft, it's more like 25 ft.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Larry A. Trivette "LarryT"
Reviews.Content: It didn't work for me, constant false alarms. Will work indoors at about 20 feet!

Reviews.Title: Excellent economical alert system!
Reviews.Author: jtcollier
Reviews.Content: I had bought the driveway patrol with the intention of being able to hear persons coming into my drive and feeling that maybe this system was a cheap knockoff.  To my suprise the system is very reliable and has the sensor has an excellent sensitivity.  The alarm is too loud and overbearing with the ability to have two volume levels.  Buy it, it works well and is a good value!

Reviews.Title: Not a workable unit
Reviews.Author: KD
Reviews.Content: Found that the receiver has to be literally adjacent to the sensor to work, rendering it useless for any kind of range detection.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Alarm!!!
Reviews.Author: James L.F.
Reviews.Content: Have more than one of this brand Alarm, use one on my driveway to allow me to know when someone is arriving, have a second one I use in my garage to tell me when my wife has arrived in here parking spot!!!!  Can be used in a lot of different ways ,other than just the driveway!!!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: foothill grandma
Reviews.Content: This sensor does not work, have tried placing it in several different places and nothing seems to work sometimes it will go off if a large vehicle goes by. I can see why they discontinued this item.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Andy Gordon
Reviews.Content: I dont know why I was expecting to get a quality product for 14 bucks. This thing barely worked. I sent it back for a refund. Dont bother wasting your time/money.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Cece
Reviews.Content: Please don't waste your time if there are anymore of these left on the planet. So the thing wouldn't even come on WITH BATTERIES!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Joseph Miller
Reviews.Content: I work at a help desk part time on the weekends, where I am the only person at the building. I got tired of being startled by full-time employees who would visit the building to pick something up or to work without my knowledge, so I bought this. I initially put the sensor on the coffee table that faces the door, but realized that because of the tint that is on the doors and the windows, the sensor wouldn't pickup any outside movements. I moved the sensor to a ledge outside, and now I have a warning for whenever the mailman or someone approaches the building. Great product. My only complaint is the amount of batteries that is used to power the devices. I spent 12 dollars on batteries for this thing - almost as much as the set itself.

Reviews.Title: WHO IS DRING ON MY DRIVEWAY????
Reviews.Author: MARIA C.
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A COOL GADGET TO BE NOTIFIED THAT SOMEONE IS DRIVING UP OUR DRIVEWAY SO WE CAN KEEP ON THE LOOK UP BEFORE THEY KNOCK AT THE DOOR & NOT GET STARTLE BY UNEXPECTED VISITORS.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Jess Portwood
Reviews.Content: Nothing special, but it has done what I needed which was to monitor our patio area.  So far I have had no problems. Sensitivity of the motion area is limited.  If you want to monitor a large area, I would not recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: Sensor
Reviews.Author: Customer again?
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 sensors and have had them in service outdoors for 3 weeks.They function great. Once in a while a rabbit will set one off which is acceptable.Have had one human intruder detected which allowed me time to grab my reaper and confront the mental-midget and hold him at gun-point until the deputy sheriff arrived to haul off the garbage. Thank you "Driveway Patrol".

Reviews.Title: COOL TOOL
Reviews.Author: Dan Simmons
Reviews.Content: WE NOW HAVE 4 THAT COVER MOST AREAS AROUND OUR HOME.  AS A RESULT WE HAVE ROUSTED A PROWLER AND MOST OF OUR NEIGHBORS NOW HAVE PURCHASED MANY UNITS.  I WISH THEY HAD DIFFERENT TONES IT WOULD BE EASIER TO DETERMINE LOCATION!!!

Reviews.Title: rather not have it, than have it
Reviews.Author: kalohe' kai
Reviews.Content: Sensor will not pick up motion of a vehicle moving at normal speeds along drive way.  Plan on installing speed bumps at sensor location to slow down traffic.  Product has added an additional worry rather than eliminating one. China wins again...

Reviews.Title: Driveway sensor
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: I got a bad one! It don't work. Had to order another one and hope it works when I get it. I ordered one years ago and it wore out after 5 yrs or so. Hopefully, I will get a good one this time.

Reviews.Title: NOT A GOOD ONE
Reviews.Author: STRONG BOY
Reviews.Content: IT SHOULD HAVE NO STARS BECAUSE IT DIDN'T WORK I WOULD NOT RECOMEND THIS TO ANYONE LET ALONE A FRIEND THE BUNKER HILL ONE IS ALOT BETTER ONE.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Daywalker28
Reviews.Content: I like this driveway patrol sensor it dose a rill good job i'm still using it to day. # 1

Reviews.Title: Mixed Emotions On This One.
Reviews.Author: Davie Lady
Reviews.Content: This product is very sensitive to all movement:  wind, birds, leaves, etc.  I tend to turn it off because of the false alarms.  We may have them placed in wrong positions.  I would not say don't purchase.  You might not have the trees that create false alarms.  I would rather be somewhat protected as not being at all.  I like the fact you can move the receiver around the house with me.  Could be a life saver if someone is trying to break in your home.

Reviews.Title: have not used it yet.
Reviews.Author: gen12Haven
Reviews.Content: I think it will work well. I really needed a system for outdoors. Although sensor is for outdoors; receiver must be in-doors.

Reviews.Title: purchased and returnrd 2 units, same resut with both
Reviews.Author: TonyS
Reviews.Content: Product is poor quality with a rated range of 400 ft but actual range clear day line of sight close to 78 ft, through a wood/sheetrock wall about 34 ft unusable with pets close to house, and 150 ft driveway

Reviews.Title: Patrol Sensor
Reviews.Author: Kathleen M
Reviews.Content: This product was recieved in the estimated time and in good condition. Under a different situation, I am sure that it would work just fine, however, because the head of our driveway is about 300 ft. down hill from our home,the monitor doesn't receive the signal. We will probably use it out at our lake property, which is on more level ground.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't ever deserve one star rate
Reviews.Author: Mojowren
Reviews.Content: Bought two As seen on TV Driveway Patrol Alarms, both are worthless.  Thanks to Amazon for having a great return policy, or I would never shop here again.  Amazon Great, stupid driveway alarm did work for a few minutes and then it stopped, had to hold it in my hands to work again.  That's why they say, " you get what you pay for".  I really would like to find an affordable driveway alarm that does work for more than a couple of minutes and that I do not need to hold or leave the door open or affixed.

Reviews.Title: Good, despite the other comments
Reviews.Author: Thunderidge
Reviews.Content: I think this product is great of you have a small area to protect. Mine is on the fence and faced where people standing at the gate trigger it. I do have a few false alarms mainly rabbits on the ground easily eliminated with a piece of tape 1/4 of the way over the beam. It has been great and alerted me every time. The battery life is about 3 mos. I have not had weather issues with it and its out in the open. I have not had it go through the winter yet so I may update this by spring. I don't have my dogs out all night so this is great for night time. Been great!

Reviews.Title: Keeping my mom safe ....
Reviews.Author: June
Reviews.Content: I have been so very pleased with this "alert" system. I am caring for my mom in her home as our preferred option over nursing home placement for her. With the sensor set up near her bed at night, if there is movement to get out of bed the receiver sounds a chime and I can attend to her need. No falling, no wandering around the house at night. This system has performed wonderfully for us. Having had the item work, & knowing I will be alerted if needed has let me get a more sound sleep so I can be a better caregiver during the day.

Reviews.Title: driveway sensor
Reviews.Author: Gene Douglas Poulton
Reviews.Content: I was a little disappointed with this since it is only line of sight between transmitter/receiver. It will not work for what I wanted but I'll find some use for it.

Reviews.Title: best driveway moniter out there.
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a cheap way to protect your yard and easy to install this is the product. I liked it so much I bought 5 for my self in case they stop making it and my friend wanted 5 to he likes them. It works real good its nice to know when someone enters the yard theres no suprise .

Reviews.Title: bell
Reviews.Author: LC "LC"
Reviews.Content: It is loud even when it is on low.  Works good.  Good service on order.  Will look for something less noisy next time.

Reviews.Title: Great door bell!
Reviews.Author: PellMell
Reviews.Content: Put this under my carport.  Works very well to let me know when someone is coming to my back door.  Seems to be very sensitive to motion.  I tried to put in in a clear bird feeder, but the plastic prevented the sensor from picking up motion.  Used the wooden birdhouse method recommended by another purchaser and left the front completely open.  Sometimes the possums and the birds will set it off.  Neighbor's dog set it off too.  My cats have learned to run to the kitchen window when the alarm goes off so they can see what is outside.

Reviews.Title: Consider using this indoors too as a motion detector for elder care
Reviews.Author: Janna
Reviews.Content: We use this in the house when my elderly dad is visiting - all of the kids have one now and we have one at his house for the caretakers too.  We just set the motion detector in the room near the door, so when he gets up from his nap, we can hear that he's up so we can offer assistance walking, getting to the restroom, etc.  We used to have a motion dector that rang in his room (like stores often use at the front door) but this solution is far superior for these reasons:  1.  It has a switch on the portable handheld unit, so once you hear he's up, you can turn it off until he's back resting so it doesn't disturb others in the house and keep going off the entire time you're helping him out of the room and back in and 2.  It's much less obvious/annoying to him that you're watching for him to be up so he feels more independent even though he knows that we show up to help him because of it  (because you take the unit that makes noise with you, not in his room)  3. You can take the monitor with you throughout the house, sleep in your own bed, etc and know you'll hear him.  Before that, we seemed to be sleeping on the floor outside his room too often to make sure we heard him get up at night.  We can sleep more soundly than trying to be half-awake to hear him knowing the alarm will wake us up.  It has two sound settings: Loud and Louder.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: alooknac
Reviews.Content: So far this is working perfectly for me and it's a good deal at this price.  I am using it inside my garage as a dog doorbell--she can get into the garage from the yard but I don't want her scratching at the door to the house to get it.  Because it is a loud nuisance I only turn it on when I put her out because others in the family are also in and out of the garage a lot, setting it off.  It makes 3 loud ding-dongs every time it is set off.  One would be enough for me.  I have it set on low and don't even want to hear what high is like.We will see how batteries hold up and how it works in very cold weather but for $10 I'll be happy if it only works in 3 seasons. I was wondering about an AC adapter too and wish it told you what kind to buy.I think someone else mentioned that the bottom of the sensor case is not flat which is an inconvenience, especially if you want the sensor to be portable.  It WILL stand up but it's unstable.  Seems weird to make it that way but oh well for $10 it's not perfect.  The alarm portion IS flat on the bottom so you can easily take it with you rather than permanently attach it somewhere if you want.  For instance if I am working in the front yard while the dog is in the back yard, I can carry it out front with me and set it on a windowsill or the step so I can hear it.

Reviews.Title: Worked great, then stopped.
Reviews.Author: Cubanisimo
Reviews.Content: I've ordered 3 of these over the past year.  Now, only one works.  The receivers all still work, but the 2 of the sensors have been scrambled somehow.  One of them won't stop beeping when you put the battery in, the other doesn't ever beep, even with a fresh battery.  There were a live saver at first, allowing me to work in the office, and know when customers came in into our tasting room, but now they're going in the trash, after less than a year.

Reviews.Title: Drive Way Patrol Sensor Gives Alot Of False Warnings
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: I have tried to move this sensor to several locations and it continues to sound off for no reason. It gives off alot of false alarms.

Reviews.Title: Pleasant tone-easy to set up
Reviews.Author: V. Williams
Reviews.Content: It has a more pleasant tone than the previous version.  It's easy to set up--but it didn't come with a cord.  We used the cord from the old one.

Reviews.Title: Great Item - Many Other Uses -
Reviews.Author: HORSEHEADS "Sid"
Reviews.Content: This unit has many uses other than as a signal device for the driveway.  Its uses are only limited by the imagination of the purchaser.  The product is built well, & the company selling this device is a pleasure to deal with.  Overall, very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Works OK, but too good sometimes
Reviews.Author: Louis Groves "Mrlou"
Reviews.Content: The product works good and the price is very good, but it does false alarm too much.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Alarm
Reviews.Author: Aruba1314
Reviews.Content: We are extremely satisfied with the Driveway Alarm.  It is positioned about 175 feet from the house and has not missed one visitor.  Our dogs know the sound and run to the windows to see who is coming.  We have the receiver set on low and have no problem hearing it.  We had tried much more expensive units and had to return them because they did not work.  This is a wonderful unit and the price is very affordable.  We would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great product, Great price
Reviews.Author: J. Lehman
Reviews.Content: The Driveway sensor is a great way to accomplish the goal of having an alert when you need it, for a small price.  All the other negatives that others have commented on were true, the biggest one being a lack of a lower volume alarm.  But, since I knew that in advance, I was prepared for it.  I use the sensor to sound an alarm when a deer feeder in my yard is visited so that we can watch the deer.  Not exactly it's intended use, but a good solution to a problem.  I house dthe remote sensor in a birdhouse, across from the feeder, and put the alarm in a closet, so I can just close the door to the closet when I don't want to hear the alarm.  Works great, works every time, and for a tenth of the price, it's a great option.

Reviews.Title: Decent product
Reviews.Author: J. Hill
Reviews.Content: Product works exactly as advertised. Only complaint is the volume is too loud when on low setting.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol Sensor and Receiver Kit
Reviews.Author: Linda J. Hyde
Reviews.Content: Driveway Patrol Sensor and Receiver KitThis is a great item for safety and security at a great price. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: A nurse who's seen it all
Reviews.Content: This is not a bad unit for the price. I actually put two receivers on two different trees leading up my long driveway and I am happy.  Forget it if it is windy.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol Sensor
Reviews.Author: Laura R. Simmons
Reviews.Content: Works really well.  It's a little sensitive but other than that we are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: DRIVEWAY PATROL
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: ALARM IS TOO SENSITIVE.....TOO MANY FALSE ALARMS...I TAPED OVER 90% OF THE WINDOW, BUT IT STILL HAS TOO MANY FALSE ALARMS....

Reviews.Title: This is product is JUNK...Too sensitive to be useful
Reviews.Author: Eric Spalding
Reviews.Content: I bought this driveway sensor because I could not see the driveway.  It goes off for too many reasons.  I have not even identified all the reasons it alerts me.  It is waste of money, I have found no purpose to own this alarm.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit
Reviews.Author: John Hogan
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup, easy to use. I get false alarms sometimes as we are in Florida and have Lizards, Frogs which sometimes move right onto the Sensor unit outside (and of course set it off). Outside sensor does have a cheap rubber gasket around it but I sealed mine as well with Silicone as the gasket does not fit well and it has not gotten any water into the unit yet :)It picks up around 30 feet from the outside sensor and the inside alarm unit is LOUD with two settings for loudness and will work at least 150 feet away from the outside motion sensor as that is how far mine is placed away so I know this.I put my sensor unit in a used Plastic Coffee can outside on a Pole and it does NOT catch the blowing leaves (we have 300 trees in the yard) and sees Straight ahead and to the sides a little bit (which is what I wanted it to see).I have it setup in the can so as NOT to see our Cat but it DOES see mid sized Dogs (which are problematic here). I have a Solar light on the same pole (just above the alarm sensor a couple of feet) which also comes on about the same time the motion sensor picks something up (except lizards, frogs, etc).When it Does go off, I pick up my pellet gun (.25 cal pellet gun) look out at the area (which is now lite up with the solar light) and if it is a roaming dog, raccoon, opossum, PERSON, etc I have options at that point to Deal with it. This type of alert system is something Everyone should have for protection as well as security.Put it onto a Pole in the ground about 3 feet high on the pole, put a Solar or battery powered light near the top of that pole also equipped with a Motion Sensor which turns it on and you have a decent Pre Alarm, notice type of system for those things entering your property or getting into your Trash.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: defense851
Reviews.Content: This is the best....must have....works on motion....only...and bells to living room....bells rings in two tones...nice.....doesn't work when walking past window though....doesn't work about glass.....

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Donald R Cook
Reviews.Content: This item is plastic and probably needs housing to protect it from the elements. I decided not to use it. It's loud and there is no way to change the volume. It picks up movement very well.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for china junk
Reviews.Author: W. Roth
Reviews.Content: we bought 2 one for our buisness drive and one for our private drive they all have the same freqencys.you don't know which one and where.If your neighbor has one also your alarm going to go off when his goes off they say there FCC aproved thats a lie or they would have what channel there on.buy 2 off harbor freight for $4 more they send you 2 different channel ones as I said cheap china junk.

Reviews.Title: drive way patrol
Reviews.Author: Lanis Watson "lewwats"
Reviews.Content: save your batery's this product is a rip off.i have bought two and they do not work correctly.its to costly to send back:alf-7

Reviews.Title: Many False Alarms
Reviews.Author: dickeaston
Reviews.Content: After following the directions carefully (using masking tape), placing unit in the shade and protected from the rain; the unit still gave 5-10 false alarms during the day but none at night.  I finally ended up modifying the power to the unit to work with a magnetic-micro-switch attached to a gate and then it worked (since it didn't have power until the gate was opened).

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware - HUGE SAFETY HAZARD
Reviews.Author: Richard Hackathorn
Reviews.Content: SEE MY COMMENT BELOW... I MADE A MISTAKE IN USING THE PRODUCTThe receiver uses 3 AA batteries. However, the battery compartment was NOT designed properly. Much too big for AA and with a stiff spring...meaning that the batteries slip to one side with the slightest jarring. The spring then shorts the end of the battery. The battery overheats rapidly. And you have a melt-down. I am glad that I caught it in time! Wondered why the receiver felt very warm. When I opened the battery compartment, one AA have melted is entire label and was too hot to touch!Other than a fire hazard, the product works good!

Reviews.Title: Works  pretty good for the price
Reviews.Content: Alarm went off every 15 to 20 munites the first day or two never could figure out why after that it settled down and works great. The alarm is very loud even on the lower setting. I would buy it again its great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Tool
Reviews.Author: T. cantz "Snowiedoggie"
Reviews.Content: This thang relly wurks. I hav hda know trobels with it atall. I hi-lee recomend it. 8-P

Reviews.Title: WORKS FOR ME
Reviews.Author: R. Winkle
Reviews.Content: COMPLAINT FIRST....SLIPSHOD DELIVERY!!I WAITED ALL DAY ON SCHEDULED DELIVERY DAY... MY PARCEL NEVER ARRIVED... EARLY THAT EVENING A NEIGHBOR/FRIEND FROM OVER A BLOCK AWAY WALKED UP TO MY DOOR CARRYING MY PARCEL!!!.WTH??.. HE STATED IT HAD BEEN DELIVERED TO THEIR HOME EARLIER IN THE DAY AND HE'D JUST FOUND THE TIME TO BRING IT OVER...GOOD THING WE KNEW EACH OTHER HUH.??SO WHAT HAPPENED WITH THE DELIVERY MAN.?? INATTENTION, IN A HURRY, CARELESSNESS, FATIGUE, NEGLIGENCE.?? WHATEVER THE PROBLEM WAS THERE'S NO ACCEPTABLE EXCUSE.!!!HE GOT ON THE RIGHT STREET, I LIVE IN THE 1000 BLOCK, MY ADDRESS WAS CORRECT ON THE SHIPPING LABEL, BUT MY NEIGHBOR LIVES IN THE 900 BLOCK...BIG DIFFERENCE IN NUMBERS...SURE GLAD I WASN'T EXPECTING EMERGENCY SERVICES.THE PRODUCTTHEY WORK AS STATED, I'VE USED THEM BEFORE, MY OLD ONE LASTED APPROX 4-YEARS, NO COMPLAINTS, NO PROBLEMS... I USE THESE FOR UNIVITED VISITORS WONDERING AROUND MY YARD IN THE DARK... THEY WORK EXCELLENT AS PROWLER/BURGLAR ALARMS...THANKS FOR YOUR TIME,RONCALIF.

Reviews.Title: Driveway Patrol Sensor and Receiver Kit
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I finally recieved my order, it took much longer than I was told.  I have used several of these units.  They have far too many false alarms caused by the sun going behind the clouds and then coming back out. The units definiely need to be installed out of the direct sunlight. I have made a cone over one of the units that is mounted in the sun and it seems to reduce the amount of false alarms. The 9 volt battery in the transmitter does not seem to last very long.

Reviews.Title: price is so low I'll never see it!
Reviews.Content: When I'm out of bananas my bananas are free!
